S06psp_5u:166_12: sa ca saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvāś ca nopalabhyante yeṣām arthāya saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:166_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? sattvaviviktatayā saṃnāhaviviktatā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_5u:166_14: saced evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_5u:166_18: sacet punar bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_5u:167_0: bhagavān āha: kena kāraṇena subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyā?
S06psp_5u:168_0: subhūtir āha: asattvād bhagavan na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:168_1: viviktatvāc chāntatvād anutpādatvād bhagavan na saṃsīdati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06psp_5u:168_2: anena bhagavan kāraṇena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_5u:168_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan sa nopalabhyate yaḥ saṃsīdate,
S06psp_5u:168_4: yena (PSP_5:41) vā saṃsīdate yatra vā saṃsīdate sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante.
S06psp_5u:168_5: saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate carati prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06psp_5u:168_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan sarva ete dharmā nopalabhyante yo vā saṃsīdet yena vā saṃsīdet yatra vā saṃsīdet,
S06psp_5u:168_7: evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatayo devā namasyanti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:168_8: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:168_9: na kevalaṃ subhūte sendrakair devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ saprajāpatikair devair namasyanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:168_10: ye 'pi te 'tikrāntavarṇā devaputrāḥ śubhakṛtsnā vṛhatphalā yāvac chuddhāvāsakā devaputrās te 'pi subhūte namasyanti bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ ya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:169_0: ye 'pi te subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā asaṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_5u:169_1: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:169_9: yāvat punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvān mahāsattvān buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:169_11: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās te sarve mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bhaveyur ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃs tāvata eva mārān pāpīyāso 'bhinirmimīte,
S06psp_5u:169_12: te sarve 'pratibalās tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato 'ntarāyaṃ kartum.
S06psp_5u:170_0: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:170_2: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ? sarvadharmāś ca śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:170_4: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyābhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:170_5: aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:170_6: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? yathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ samanvāharati.
S06psp_5u:170_7: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:170_8: evañ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya te devaputrā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante paryupāsyante paripraśnayanti,
S06psp_5u:170_9: utsāhañ ca dadāti: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra buddhabodhiṃ samanuprāpsyasi tasmāt tarhi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yad uta śūnyatāvihāreṇānimittavihāreṇāpraṇihitavihāreṇa.
S06psp_5u:170_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? etena tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharann anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
S06psp_5u:170_17: tat kasya hetoḥ? etena hi prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāmī guṇā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:171_0: ye 'pi te 'saṃkhyeyeṣv aprameyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtā,
S06psp_5u:171_1: yo 'sau prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty etair eva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato yad uta prajñāpāramitāguṇais tasya te buddhā bhagavanto nāmaṃ ca gotraṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:172_0: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tadyathāpi nāmāham etarhi ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi,
S06psp_5u:172_1: śikhinaś ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
S06psp_5u:173_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsatttvā akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:173_1: anayā ca prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣām ahaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmy udānaṃ codānayāmi.
S06psp_5u:174_0: ye 'pi te pūrvasyāṃ diśi buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_5u:174_1: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:174_2: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayaty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:174_3: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhvam atra vidikṣu lokadhātuṣu,
S06psp_5u:174_4: ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmaṃ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_5u:174_5: tatra ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:174_6: anayā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitās teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:175_0: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya bodhisattvamārgaṃ paripūrayamāṇā yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
S06psp_5u:175_1: teṣām api te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:175_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? evaṃ duṣkarakārakā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:176_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:176_1: katameṣāṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpās te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti vinivartanīyānāṃ vā avinivartanīyānāṃ vā?
S06psp_5u:177_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:177_1: santi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:177_2: santi vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:177_3: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:177_4: ye 'pi te ratnaketor bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranti teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:178_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti,
S06psp_5u:178_1: sarvadharmā anutpattikā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikair (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:178_3: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06psp_5u:178_4: sarvadharmāḥ śāntā ity adhimuktāḥ sarvadharmā vigatā iti tucchakā iti vaśikā ity asārakā ity adhimuktā na cānutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06psp_5u:178_5: eṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti.
S06psp_5u:179_0: yeṣāṃ te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūupā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti,
S06psp_5u:179_1: teṣām api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prahīṇā śrāvakabhūmiś ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
S06psp_5u:180_0: yasya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato buddhā bhagavanto nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanty udānaṃ codānayanti,
S06psp_5u:180_1: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati yatra sthitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_5u:180_2: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śrutvā na kāṅkṣiṣyanti na vicikitsiṣyanti na dhandhāyiṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:180_3: evam etad yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitety adhimokṣyante bodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:180_4: kas tatra sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati? nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_5u:181_0: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:181_1: gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ.
S06psp_5u:181_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? na ca nāma bhagavan kaścit tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati nāpi kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate nāpi kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_5u:181_3: atha ca nāvalīyate na cāsya kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:182_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:182_1: kathaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_5u:183_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:183_1: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ māyopamaṃ cittam.
S06psp_5u:184_0: subhūtir āha: na bhagavan, nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyāmi.
S06psp_5u:185_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte yatra na māyā,
S06psp_5u:185_1: na māyopamaṃ cittaṃ tatra samanupaśyasi tvaṃ cittam.
S06psp_5u:186_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'nyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:187_0: subhūtir āha: na bhagavan, nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamād vā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:187_1: so 'haṃ bhagavann anyaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyan tatkatamaṃ dharmam upadekṣyāmy asti vā nāsti veti? yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'stitāṃ vā nāstitāṃ vopaiti,
S06psp_5u:187_2: yo dharmo 'tyantatayā vivikto na so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:187_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃs te dharmā na saṃvidyante ye saṃkliśyeyur vyavadāyeyur vā.
S06psp_5u:187_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktā,
S06psp_5u:187_7: kṣāntipāramitātyantaviviktā, śīlapāramitātyantaviviktā, dānapāramitātyantaviviktā, evam adhyātmaśūnyatātryantaviviktā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatātyantaviviktā,
S06psp_5u:188_0: yaś cātyantavivikto dharmo na sa bhāvayitavyo vā vibhāvayitavyo vā,
S06psp_5u:188_2: yady atyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā tat kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitam āgamya bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate? anuttarāpi samyaksaṃbodhir atyantaviviktā,
S06psp_5u:189_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:189_1: sādhu sādhu (PSP_5:46) subhūte evam etat, atyantaviviktā hi subhūte prajñapāramitā,
S06psp_5u:189_6: saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattaya āryasatyāni śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāny abhijñāḥ sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā atyantaviviktā,
S06psp_5u:189_7: anuttarā samayaksaṃbodhir atyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatā atyantaviviktā.
S06psp_5u:189_8: yathā subhūte 'tyantaviviktā prajñāpāramitā yāvat sarvākārajñatā tathātyantaviviktām anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:190_0: sacet subhūte na prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktābhaviṣyad yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā bhaviṣyan na prajñāpāramitābhaviṣyad yāvan na sarvākārajñatābhaviṣyad evaṃ na prajñapāramitā.
S06psp_5u:190_1: ye ca punar evaṃ śroṣyanti akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ cāntikād,
S06psp_5u:190_2: ayam api bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgala imāṃ prajñāpāramitām adhimokṣyate,
S06psp_5u:190_3: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitā tathādhimucyamāno 'vinivartanīyatāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06psp_5u:190_4: evaṃ bahukaraṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇaṃ vadāmi,
S06psp_5u:190_5: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhimokṣyante 'dhimucya tathatvāya sthāsyanti tathatvāya pratipatsyante tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadyamānās tiṣṭhanti sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_5u:191_0: subhūtir āha: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathatāyāṃ sthitvā tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamāno na kaścid dharmam upalabhate tadā kathaṃ tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām?
S06psp_5u:192_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:192_1: yathā subhūte tathāgatanirmitas tiṣṭhati tathā tiṣṭhati sarvākārajñatāyām.
S06psp_5u:193_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:193_1: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:193_2: ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati? ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate? ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati? tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:193_3: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:193_4: 47) tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:194_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:194_2: tathāgatanirmito na kaścid dharmam upalabhate ko 'yaṃ tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:194_3: ko vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:194_4: ko yā tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharman deśayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:194_6: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:194_7: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathā yathā vadasi, na subhūte tathāgatanirmitaḥ kaścid dharmam upalabhate yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:194_8: yas tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:194_9: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathatāyāṃ sthāsyati tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samysaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate tathatāyāṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyantiti,
S06psp_5u:194_10: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kasya hetoḥ? utpādād vā subhūte tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā tathatā avitathatā ananyatathatā dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā bhūtakoṭir,
S06psp_5u:194_11: neha subhūte tathatāyāṃ kaścit tiṣṭhati na tathatāyāṃ kaścid anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate na tathatāyāṃ kaścid dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_5u:194_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy atra tathatāyāṃ dharma upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:194_13: yo vā tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhet, yo vā tathatāyāṃ sthitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:194_14: yo vā tathatāyā sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:194_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathataiva tāvan nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:194_16: naivāsyotpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvam.
S06psp_5u:194_17: yatrāsya dharmasya notpāda upalabhyate na vyayo na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ,
S06psp_5u:194_18: kas tatra sthāsyati? ko vā tatra sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate? tasmāt tarhi subhūte prajñāpāramitātyantaviviktā yāvat sarvākārajñatātyantaviviktā,
S06psp_5u:194_19: tasmāt subhūte prajñapāramitām āgamya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:194_21: abhisaṃbhotsyate ca, na ca tām anāgamya prajñāpāramitām abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:195_0: subhūtir āha: gambhīre bhagavann arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:196_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, gambhīre 'rthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvo,
S06psp_5u:196_2: yo gambhīre 'rthe carati, tañ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yad uta śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:197_0: subhūtir āha: yathāhaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitasyārtham ājānāmi tathā na kaścid duṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:197_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan so 'rtho nopalabhyate yaṃ sākṣātkuryāt.
S06psp_5u:197_4: anupalabhamāno bhagavan sarvadharmāṃs tat katamam arthaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati? katamāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sākṣātkariṣyati? katamaṃ dharmaṃ sākṣātkariṣyati yaṃ sākṣātkṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate? iyaṃ bhagavann anupalambhacarir bodhisattvacarir yatra caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmair anandhakāratām anuprāpnoti.
S06psp_5u:198_0: saced bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipratisārī bhavati mānasaṃ nottrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsam āpadyate,
S06psp_5u:198_1: evañ caraṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:198_2: sa caran nimittam api na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:198_4: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyata iti na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_5u:199_0: tasya khalu punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:199_1: dūrīkariṣyāmi śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vāsanno 'smi sarvākārajñatāyāḥ.
S06psp_5u:200_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan nākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati kasyacid,
S06psp_5u:200_1: ahaṃ dūre vābhyāse vā. tat kasya hetoḥ? abhedatvād bhagavann ākāśasya.
S06psp_5u:200_2: evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:200_3: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre,
S06psp_5u:200_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvād bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06psp_5u:201_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:201_1: māyākāro vā na mama dūre māyākāro mamābhyāse,
S06psp_5u:201_2: yaḥ punar evaṃ janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūre nābhyāse.
S06psp_5u:201_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvād bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya.
S06psp_5u:201_4: evam eva bhagavan na prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:201_5: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse.
S06psp_5u:201_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvād bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ iti samudāgamavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:202_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:202_2: ye punar atra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūre.
S06psp_5u:202_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvād bhagavan pratibhāsasya,
S06psp_5u:202_4: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:202_5: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse.
S06psp_5u:202_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? avidyamānatvād bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06psp_5u:203_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate.
S06psp_5u:203_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asya svabhāvo nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:203_2: evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā na kaścit priyo vāpriyo vā saṃvidyate.
S06psp_5u:203_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nopalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:204_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavikalpaprahīṇa evam eva bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvavikalpaprahīṇā avikalpatām upādāya.
S06psp_5u:205_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:205_1: śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir mamābhyāse.
S06psp_5u:205_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvād bhagavaṃs tathāgatanirmitasya,
S06psp_5u:205_3: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:205_4: srāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā mama dūre 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhyāse.
S06psp_5u:205_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvād bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06psp_5u:206_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃs tathāgatena yo nirmitaḥ sa yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca nirmino 'vikalpo (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:206_1: 50) nirvikalpaḥ. evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā ca prajñāpāramitāvikalpā nirvikalpā.
S06psp_5u:207_0: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt strīvigraho vā puruṣavigraho vā hastivigraho vā balīvardavigraho vā,
S06psp_5u:207_1: sa ca yantrayukto yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena kṛtas tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sa ca yantrayukto 'vikalpo nirvikalpaḥ.
S06psp_5u:207_2: evam eva bhagavan yasya kṛtyasya kṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvyate tac ca kṛtyaṃ karoti sā prajñāpāramitā avikalpā nirvikalpā.
S06psp_5u:207_3: iti kriyāsāphalyavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidhaḥ prathamo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:208_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:208_1: kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:209_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etd avocat:
S06psp_5u:210_0: subhūtir āha: kiyanto buddhā bhagavataḥ paryupāsitā bhagavaṃs tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:211_0: bhagavān āha: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitās taiḥ kulaputrair vā kuladuhitṛbhir vā bhavitavyā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:212_0: subhūtir āha: kiyat tair bhagavan kuśalamūlaṃ kṛtaṃ bodhisattvair mahāsattvair ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ?
S06psp_5u:213_0: bhagavān āha: prathamacittotpādam upādāya subhūte na sā kācid dānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
S06psp_5u:213_1: na sā kācic chīlapāramitā, na sā kācit kṣāntipāramitā, na sā kācid vīryapāramitā, na sā kācid dhyānapāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā,
S06psp_5u:213_2: na sā kācit prajñāpāramitā yā tair bodhisattvair mahāsattvair na paripūritā ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:214_0: subhūtir āha: āścaryam etad bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:215_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, āścaryam etat subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ye 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatāḥ.
S06psp_5u:215_1: tadyathāpi nāma sūryācandramasau maṇḍale caturṣu dvīpeṣu kāryaṃ kurvāte caturo dvīpān anugacchataḥ,
S06psp_5u:215_2: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā pañcasu pāramitāsu karma karoti pañca pāramitā anugacchanti,
S06psp_5u:215_5: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yathā rājā cakravartī virahitaḥ saptabhī ratnair na rājā cakravartīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06psp_5u:215_6: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitā virahitatvāt prajñāpāramitayā na pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante.
S06psp_5u:216_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte apuruṣā strī sudharṣaṇā bhavati dhūrtakānām,
S06psp_5u:216_1: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvāt sudharṣaṇā bhavanti māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:217_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ puruṣaḥ saṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ saṃgrāme vartamāne durdharṣo bhavati rājanyair vā pratyarthikair vā pratyamitrair vā,
S06psp_5u:217_1: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitatvād durdharṣā bhavanti māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhir ādhimānikair vā pudgalair yāvad evaṃ bodhisattvacaṇḍālair vā pañca pāramitā durdharṣā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:218_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte koṭṭarājāno rājñaś cakravartino 'nuvidheyā bhavanti so 'yaṃ prātarupasthāno yo gacchanti,
S06psp_5u:218_1: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti.
S06psp_5u:219_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kācit kunadyaḥ sarvās tā yena gaṅgānadī tenānugacchanti tā gaṅgānadyā sārdhaṃ mahāsamudram upayānti,
S06psp_5u:219_1: evam eva pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti.
S06psp_5u:220_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya dakṣiṇo hastaḥ sarvakṛtyāni karoty,
S06psp_5u:220_2: yathā ca vāmahasta (PSP_5:52) evaṃ pañca pāramitā draṣṭavyāḥ.
S06psp_5u:220_4: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yac ca kunadīnāṃ yac ca mahānadīnām udakaṃ sarvaṃ taṃ mahāsamudrapraviṣṭam ekarasaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:220_5: evam eva subhūte pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītā anupraviṣṭāḥ pāramitā nāmadheyaṃ labhante.
S06psp_5u:221_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgasya balakāyasya cakraratnam agrato gacchati,
S06psp_5u:221_1: tiṣṭhati ca yatra rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ tiṣṭhati tatra rājā cakravartī balakāyam arpayati na ca cakraratnaṃ sthānataś calati,
S06psp_5u:221_2: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pariṇāyikā yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchanti,
S06psp_5u:221_3: tatra sthāsyanti tatra sthitvā sthānato nātikrāmanti.
S06psp_5u:222_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś cakraratnaṃ sapariṇāyakaratnaṃ sagṛhapatiratnaṃ caturaṅgasya balakāyasyāgrato gacchaty,
S06psp_5u:222_1: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāgrato gacchaty agrato gatvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena tiṣṭhati.
S06psp_5u:222_3: dānapāramitā mamānugacchec, chīlapāramitā mamānugacchet, kṣāntipāramitā mamānugacched,
S06psp_5u:222_7: na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyā evaṃ bhavaty,
S06psp_5u:222_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? svabhāva āsām akiṃcitsamarthaḥ svabhāvaḥ śūnyas tuccho marīcisamaḥ.
S06psp_5u:223_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:223_1: yadā bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyās tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dānapāramitāyāṃ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñapāramitāyāṃ carann anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate?
S06psp_5u:224_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:224_4: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmīti,
S06psp_5u:224_5: sa teṣāṃ sattvānām (PSP_5:53) arthāyādhyātmabahirdhāvastu parityajati tasya ca parityajata evaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:224_6: na kiṃcit parityaktam. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy etad vastu svabhāvaśūnyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:224_7: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati.
S06psp_5u:224_8: teṣāñ ca sattvānām arthāya dauḥśīlyasyāvakāśaṃ na dadāti.
S06psp_5u:224_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy etan mama pratirūpaṃ syād yo 'ham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kuryām,
S06psp_5u:224_10: evam adattādānaṃ kāmamithyācāraṃ mṛṣāvādaṃ piśunavacanaṃ paruṣavacanam abaddhapralāpam abhidhyāṃ vyāpādaṃ mithyādṛṣṭiṃ kuryāṃ,
S06psp_5u:224_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:224_13: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāyaikacittotpādam api na kṣobhayati,
S06psp_5u:224_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāñ carati.
S06psp_5u:224_15: teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya kauśīdyacittaṃ notpādayati,
S06psp_5u:224_17: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:224_18: sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya vikṣiptacitto na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:224_20: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyupaparīkṣamāṇo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:224_21: sa teṣām eva sattvānām arthāya na jātu prajñāpāramitāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:224_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy anyathā śakyāḥ sattvāḥ paripācayitum anyatra prajñayety arthavaśenaivam arthaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:225_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:225_2: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate 'nuttarākhyāyate?
S06psp_5u:226_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na subhūte pāramitānāṃ kiñcit nānātvaṃ,
S06psp_5u:226_2: nemāḥ pañca pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labheran prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ subhūte āgamya imāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante tadyathāpi nāma subhūte nānāprakārā ātmabhāvāḥ sumeruṃ parvatarājam upasaṃkrāntā ekavarṇā (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:226_4: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitām āgamya pañca pāramitāḥ pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante,
S06psp_5u:226_7: iyaṃ dānapāramitā, iyaṃ śīlapāramitā, iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā, iyaṃ vīryapāramitā, iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā, iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy āsāṃ svabhāvo nāsty anena kāraṇena svabhāvo na prajñāyate.
S06psp_5u:227_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:227_1: katham iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttāmākhyāyate anuttarākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate?
S06psp_5u:228_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, arthānupratipannasya kasyacid dharmasya viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā na prajñāyate.
S06psp_5u:228_1: api tu khalu punar lokavyavahārasaṃketam upādāya dānapāramitā prajñaptā,
S06psp_5u:228_2: śīlapāramitā prajñaptā, kṣāntipāramitā prajñaptā, vīryapāramitā prajñaptā, dhyānapāramitā prajñaptā sattvānāṃ saṃsārataḥ parimocanāya.
S06psp_5u:228_3: te ca sattvā na jāyante na mriyante na cyavante nopapadyante,
S06psp_5u:228_5: anena subhūte kāraṇenāsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:228_6: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte yāḥ kāścana striyas tāsāṃ strīratnam agram ākhyāyate jyeṣṭham ākhyāyate śreṣṭham ākhyāyate varam ākhyāyate pravaram ākhyāyate praṇītam ākhyāyate uttamam ākhyāyate anuttamam ākhyāyate niruttamam ākhyāyate asamam ākhyāyate asamasamam ākhyāyate.
S06psp_5u:228_7: evam eva subhūte prajñāpāramitā āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānām agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate.
S06psp_5u:229_0: subhūtir āha: ka eṣa bhagavann abhiprāyo yat prajñāpāramitā agrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:229_1: 55) praṇītākhyāyate' uttamākhyāyate anuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate asamākhyāyate asamasamākhyāyate?
S06psp_5u:230_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā sarvān kuśalān dharmān gṛhītvā yena sarvākārajñatā tena sthāsyaty asthānayogena.
S06psp_5u:230_1: iti pṛṣṭato niryāṇavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhyavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:231_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā?
S06psp_5u:232_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte prajñāpāramitā kañcid dharmaṃ gṛhṇāti vā muñcati vā.
S06psp_5u:232_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte sarvadharmā agṛhītā amuktāḥ.
S06psp_5u:233_0: subhūtir āha: tat katamān bhagavan sarvadharmān prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati?
S06psp_5u:234_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati,
S06psp_5u:234_1: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:234_2: vijñānaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
S06psp_5u:234_3: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādaṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni subhūte prajñāpāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
S06psp_5u:234_4: evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāny abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikān buddhadharmān anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ subhūte prajñapāramitā na gṛhṇāti na muñcati.
S06psp_5u:235_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:236_0: bhagavān āha: yaḥ subhūte rūpasyāmanasikāro vedanāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃjñāyā amanasikāraḥ saṃskārāṇām amanasikāro vijñānasyāmanasikāraḥ,
S06psp_5u:236_9: evaṃ hy etat subhūte rūpam aparigṛhītaṃ bhavati yāvat sarvākārajñatā parigṛhītā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:237_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan rūpaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:237_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ na manasikartavyaṃ, evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā na manasikartavyāni,
S06psp_5u:237_2: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāny abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikā buddhadharmā na manasikartavyāḥ sarvākārajñatā na manasikartavyā tat kathaṃ bhagavan rūpam amanasikṛtvā,
S06psp_5u:237_3: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān, vijñānam amanasikṛtvā, skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vāmanasikṛtvā,
S06psp_5u:237_4: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāny apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāny abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmān amanasikṛtvā sarvākārajñatām amanasikṛtvā kuśalamūlāni vivardhante? kuśalamūlaiś cāvivardhamānaiḥ kathaṃ pāramitāḥ paripūryante? pāramitā aparipūrya kathaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:238_0: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte rūpaṃ na manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:238_1: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:238_4: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāparamāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:238_8: tadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlāni vivardhiṣyante yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_5u:238_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? amanasikṛtvā hi rūpaṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:238_10: 57) vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārāṃ vijñanam amanasikṛtvā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny amanasikṛtvā sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃsadbodhipakṣyān dharmān āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikān buddhadharmān amanasikṛtvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:238_12: subhūtir āha: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena rūpam amanasikāraṃ,
S06psp_5u:238_13: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam amanasikāram, evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā manasikārāṇi,
S06psp_5u:238_14: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāny abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā amanasikārā,
S06psp_5u:239_0: bhagavān āha: amanasikāreṇa hi na śliṣyate kāmadhātau na śliṣyate rūpadhātau na śliṣyate ārūpyadhātāv amanasikāreṇa na kvacic chliṣyate,
S06psp_5u:239_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā na kvacid dharme śliṣyate.
S06psp_5u:240_0: subhūtir āha: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kvacit sthāsyati.
S06psp_5u:241_0: bhagavān āha: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:241_2: vijñāne na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ caran skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na tiṣṭhati,
S06psp_5u:241_3: sarvapāramitāsu sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñāsu daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmeṣu na tiṣṭhaty,
S06psp_5u:241_4: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyām api na tiṣṭhati.
S06psp_5u:242_0: subhūtir āha: kim atra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tatrāpi na tiṣṭhati?
S06psp_5u:243_0: bhagavān āha: anabhiniveśena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvacit (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:243_1: 58) tiṣṭhati. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmān na samanupaśyati yatrābhiniviśeta vā tiṣṭhed vā,
S06psp_5u:243_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraty anabhiniveśyāsthānayogena.
S06psp_5u:244_1: ya evaṃ bhāvayaty evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:244_2: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carāmy ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayāmi.
S06psp_5u:244_5: dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā dānapāramitāyā dūrībhavati,
S06psp_5u:244_9: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitā kvacid dharme 'bhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:244_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti yatrābhiniviśateḥ.
S06psp_5u:245_0: sacet punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitām api saṃjānīte cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñapāramitāyā yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati sarvadharmeṣu carati.
S06psp_5u:245_1: saced asyaivaṃ bhavati, prajñāpāramitā pañca pāramitāḥ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:245_6: sarvākārajñatāṃ parigṛhṇāti, cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:245_7: na khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāvirahitena śakyānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃboddhum.
S06psp_5u:246_0: sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavatīha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyākariṣyaty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cyuto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ.
S06psp_5u:246_2: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitām abhinirhariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:246_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitācyutasya,
S06psp_5u:246_14: na hy ādhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatācyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
S06psp_5u:246_18: na hi sarvākārajñatā cyutasya śakyam abhinirharaṇāya,
S06psp_5u:247_0: sacet punar asyaivaṃ bhavati, aparigṛhītās tathāgatena sarvadharmāḥ svayam abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbudhyākhyātā deśitāḥ prakāśitāś,
S06psp_5u:247_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi tathāgatena kaścid dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:247_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? dṛṣṭaṃ dharmaṃ na prajñapayati,
S06psp_5u:248_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:248_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ime doṣā na bhavanti?
S06psp_5u:249_0: bhagavān āha: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evañ jānāti,
S06psp_5u:249_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitābhiniveśena vartitavyā.
S06psp_5u:250_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramita prajñāpāramitayāvirahitā? dhyānapāramitā dhyānapāramitayāvirahitā,
S06psp_5u:250_8: mārgā mārgair avirahitā, āryasatyāny āryasatyair avirahitāny,
S06psp_5u:250_12: sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayāvirahitā? saced bhagavan prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitayāvirahitā,
S06psp_5u:251_0: tat kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā? evaṃ dhyānaṃ vīryaṃ kṣāntiḥ śīlaṃ,
S06psp_5u:251_1: tat kathaṃ dānapāramitābhinirhartavyā? yāvat tat kathaṃ sarvākārajñatābhinirhartavyā?
S06psp_5u:252_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpam iti nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:252_1: idaṃ rūpam asya rūpam, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam iti nābhiniviśate, idaṃ vijñānam asya vijñānam. evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nābhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:252_2: ime skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāny asya skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ceti,
S06psp_5u:252_5: rūpaṃ nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:252_6: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:252_8: 61) pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nityato vānityato vā duḥkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:252_9: yāvat sarvākārajñatāṃ nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā na samanupaśyati.
S06psp_5u:252_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi dharmo nityato vānityato vā duṣkhato vā sukhato vātmato vānātmato vā śūnyato vāśūnyato vā viviktato vāviviktato vā saṃvidyate,
S06psp_5u:253_0: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ dānapāramitāyāṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatāyāṃ sthāsyati.
S06psp_5u:253_1: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaś cakravartinaś caturaṅgabalakāyo yena yena sa rājā gacchati tena tenānuvartate,
S06psp_5u:253_2: evam eva subhūte yena yena prajñāpāramitā gacchati tena tenemāḥ pañca pāramitā anuvartante,
S06psp_5u:254_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sārathiś caturaṅgam abhiruhya satmārgeṇa gacchati,
S06psp_5u:254_1: evam eva subhūte āsāṃ pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ prajñāpāramitā sārathyaṃ karoti samyagmārgeṇa yena sarvākārajñatā tenānugacchati.
S06psp_5u:255_0: subhūtir āha: katamo bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārgaḥ? katamo 'mārgaḥ?
S06psp_5u:256_0: bhagavān āha: śrāvakamārgo bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām amārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:257_0: subhūtir āha: mahākṛtyena bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_5u:258_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:258_1: evaṃ nayati (PSP_5:62) praṇayati, ayaṃ mārgo 'yam amārga iti. aprameyāṇam asaṃkhyeyānām aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyena pratyupasthitā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:258_2: na kaścit subhūte praṇayati na rūpaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:258_3: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:258_4: na vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇāti, na śrāvakabhūmer vā na pratyekabudddhabhūmer vā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:258_5: sā khalu punar iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāyikānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06psp_5u:258_8: evam iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā dharmasthititāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya.
S06psp_5u:259_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyotpādikā na nirodhikā,
S06psp_5u:259_1: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā dānaṃ dātavyaṃ? kathaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:259_2: kathaṃ kṣāntir bhāvayitavyā, kathaṃ vīryam ārabdhavyaṃ, kathaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:260_0: bhagavān āha: sarvākārajñatām ārambaṇīkṛtya dānaṃ dātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:260_6: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitavyāni.
S06psp_5u:260_7: tathā ca pariṇāmayitavyāni yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:260_8: ka eṣa pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imān kuśalān dharmān anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayataḥ ṣaṭpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvad bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya maitrībhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati yāvat sarvākārajñatābhāvanā paripūriṅ gacchati.
S06psp_5u:260_9: yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ pāramitābhir avirahitaḥ sarvākārajñatayāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:260_10: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitavyaṃ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:260_11: ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvān kuśalān dharmān paripūrya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:260_12: tasmād (PSP_5:63) bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:261_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ?
S06psp_5u:262_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pratyavekṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:262_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñanaṃ na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_5u:262_3: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na visaṃyuktāni,
S06psp_5u:262_5: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:262_6: sarvākārajñatā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:263_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpe sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:263_1: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06psp_5u:263_3: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:263_4: na pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu na sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:263_5: evaṃ na sarvapāramitāsu sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:263_6: na sarvaśūnyatāsu na saptatriṃśatsu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu na śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu nābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsu nāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu sthāsyāmīti yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:263_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi rūpaṃ vā kvacit sthitaṃ,
S06psp_5u:263_9: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā,
S06psp_5u:263_10: na vijñānaṃ kvacit sthitaṃ, na skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā kvacit sthitāni,
S06psp_5u:263_11: evaṃ na pāramitā na śūnyatā na bodhipakṣyā dharmā nāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na vimokṣamukhāni nābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmāḥ kvacit sthitā,
S06psp_5u:264_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa āmraphalāni vā panasaphalaṃ vā bhakṣayitukāmaḥ syāt tenāmraphalaṃ panasaphalaṃ vāvaropayitavyam,
S06psp_5u:264_2: tasyānupūrveṇa saṃbaddhyamānasya stambasya sāmagrī labhamānasy āmraphalair vā panasaphalair vā sāmagrī bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:264_3: sa tāny āmraphalāni vā parasaphalāni vā bhakṣiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:264_4: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā sattvān dānenānugrahīṣyati śīlena kṣāntyā vīryeṇa dhyānena prajñayānugrahīṣyati sattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:265_0: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena,
S06psp_5u:265_2: bodhimaṇḍe nisīditukāmena, dharmacakraṃ pravartayitukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:266_0: subhūtir āha: prajñāpāramitayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadasi.
S06psp_5u:267_0: bhagavān āha: prajñāpāramitayā subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi,
S06psp_5u:267_1: sarvadharmavaśitām anuprāptukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam iti vadāmi.
S06psp_5u:268_0: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmavaśitām anuprāpayati,
S06psp_5u:268_2: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudraḥ sarvaratnānāṃ sarvasaritāṃ mukhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:268_5: sarvadharmā hi prajñāpāramitā bhāvitāḥ prajñāpāramitā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:268_6: tasmāt tarhi śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā bodhisattvayānikair vā pudgalair ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:268_7: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06psp_5u:268_8: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:268_11: 65) śikṣitavyaṃ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu śikṣitavyaṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsu śikṣitavyam aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:269_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte iṣvastrācāryo yathānurūpaṃ dhanur gṛhītvā durādharṣo bhavati pratyarthikānāṃ vā pratyamitrāṇāṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:269_1: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran durādharṣo bhavati mārair vā mārakāyikābhir vā devatābhis tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:269_2: taṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran tam atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāharanti.
S06psp_5u:270_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:270_1: kathaṃ bhagavan buddhā bhagavanto dānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti? śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:270_2: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:270_3: vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:270_4: dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:270_5: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:270_6: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:270_7: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:270_8: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgeṣu caran tam āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu caran tam abhijñāsu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran taṃ daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsv āveṇikābuddhadharmeṣu caran taṃ,
S06psp_5u:270_9: kathaṃ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti?
S06psp_5u:271_0: evam utkte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:271_1: iha subhūte atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran taṃ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:271_2: tathā ca samanvāharanti yatra naiva dānaṃ na śīlan na kṣāntir na vīryan na dhyānaṃ na prajñopalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:272_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ na rūpataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:272_1: na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārato,
S06psp_5u:272_3: na skandhato na dhātuto nāyatanato na pratītyasamutpādato na pratītyasamutpādāṅgataḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:272_4: na dānapāramitāto na śīlapāramitāto na kṣāntipāramitāto na vīryapāramitāto na dhyānapāramitāto na prajñāpāramitātaḥ samanvāharanti,
S06psp_5u:272_10: iti pratyarthikadharmopalambhavikalpaḥ ity ukto navavidho dvitīyo grāhakavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:273_0: atha khalu subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:273_1: yat tvaṃ kauśikaivaṃ vadasi gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:273_2: duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yeṣāṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitatvaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:273_3: śūnyeṣu kauśika sarvadharmeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatvaṃ vā dhanvāyitvaṃ vā bhaviṣyati?
S06psp_5u:273_4: evam ukte śakro devānām indraḥ subhūtisthaviram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:273_5: yadyad eva subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati sarvan tac chūnyatām evārabhya nirdiśati na kvacit sajjati,
S06psp_5u:273_6: tadyathāpi nāmeṣur antarīkṣe kṣipto na kvacit sajjati,
S06psp_5u:273_7: evam eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya dharmadeśanā na kvacit sajjati.
S06psp_5u:274_0: atha khalu sakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:274_1: kaccid ahaṃ bhagavann evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśann uktavādī ca bhagavato dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ samyag vyākurvan vyākaromi?
S06psp_5u:275_0: bhagavān āha: samyak khalu tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣamāṇa evam upadiśaṃs tathāgatasyoktavādī ca dharmavādī ca dharmasya cānudharmaṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:276_0: devendra āha: āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvad eva subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti sarvan tac chūnyatāṃ caivārabhya pratibhāti,
S06psp_5u:277_0: evam ukte bhagavān śakran devānām indram etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:277_1: subhūtiḥ kauśika sthaviraḥ śūnyatāyāṃ viharan dānapāramitāñ caiva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:277_2: kaḥ punar vādo ye dānapāramitāyāṃ caranti śīlapāramitāyāṃ caranti kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caranti vīryapāramitāyāṃ caranti dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caranti prajñāpāramitāñ caiva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:277_3: kaḥ punar vādo ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranti.
S06psp_5u:277_5: kaḥ punar vādo ye smṛtyupasthānāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:277_9: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'dhyātmaśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:277_10: āryasatyāny eva nopalabhate, kaḥ punar vādo ya āryasatyāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:277_14: kaḥ punar vādo ye śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:277_18: kaḥ punar vādo ye balāni bhāvayanti vaiśāradyāny eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:277_19: kaḥ punar vādo ye vaiśāradyāny abhinirharanti,
S06psp_5u:277_21: kaḥ punar vādo ye pratisaṃvido 'bhinirharanti abhijñā eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:277_23: mahākaruṇām eva nopalabhate, kaḥ punar vādo ye mahākaruṇāvihāraṃ bhāvayanti,
S06psp_5u:277_25: kaḥ punar vādo ye āveṇikāṃ buddhadharmān abhinirharanti,
S06psp_5u:277_27: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante,
S06psp_5u:277_29: kaḥ punar vādo ye sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuvanti,
S06psp_5u:277_31: kaḥ punar vādo yas tathāgato bhavaty anutpādam eva nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:277_32: kaḥ punar vādo ye 'nutpādaṃ sākṣāt kurvanti,
S06psp_5u:277_33: lakṣaṇāny eva nopalabhate, kaḥ punar vādo yeṣāṃ lakṣaṇāni kāye bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:277_35: kaḥ punar vādo yeṣām anuvyañjanāni kāye bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:277_36: tat kasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmaviviktavihārī kauśika subhūtiḥ,
S06psp_5u:277_37: anupalambhavihārī śūnyatāvihāry ānimittavihāry apraṇihitavihārī kauśika ya eṣa subhūteḥ sthavirasya vihāraḥ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato vihārasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api kotītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām apy upamām apy aupamyam apy upaniśām apy upaniṣadam api nopaiti.
S06psp_5u:277_38: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tathāgatavihāraṃ sthāpayitvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato yo vihāraḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ ca ye vihārās teṣāṃ vihārāṇām ayaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāñ carato yo vihāraḥ so 'gra ākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:277_39: śreṣṭha ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate, vara ākhyāyate, pravara ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate, anuttama ākhyāyate, niruttama ākhyāyate. tasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvenāgratāṃ gantukāmenānena vihāreṇa vihartavyaṃ yad uta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa.
S06psp_5u:277_40: tat kasya hetoḥ? atra hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikrāmati,
S06psp_5u:277_43: sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāno bhaviṣyati.
S06psp_5u:278_0: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi devās trayastriṃśā māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti smābhiprakiranti sma.
S06psp_5u:278_1: ṣaṣṭiñ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ śatam utsthāyāsanebhya ekāṃśañ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayām āsuḥ,
S06psp_5u:278_2: teṣāṃ ca bhikṣūṇām añjalayaḥ praṇāmitā buddhānubhāvena māndāravaiḥ puṣpaiḥ paripūrṇā abhūvaṃs te ca māndāravaiḥ puṣpais tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham avakiranti smābhyavakiranti smābhiprakiranti (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:278_3: 69) smāvakiranto 'bhyavakiranto 'bhiprakiranta evaṃ ca vācam udīrayanti sma:
S06psp_5u:278_4: vayaṃ bhagavann etena kuśalamūlenaitenottamena vihāreṇa vihariṣyāmo yatra nāgatiḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām iti.
S06psp_5u:279_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyā velāyāṃ teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇām adhyāśayaṃ viditvā smitaṃ praduṣkaroti sma.
S06psp_5u:279_1: dharmatā khalu punar eṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti tadā khalv anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā arciṣo bhagavato mukhadvārān niścaranti sma,
S06psp_5u:279_2: tadyathā nīlāḥ pītā lohitā avadātā māñjiṣṭhā rajatavarṇās trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātum avabhāsya punar evāgatya buddhān bhagavatas triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhany antarhitāḥ.
S06psp_5u:280_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān ānanda utthāyāsanād ekāṃśaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:280_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ? kaḥ pratyayaḥ? smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya nāhetukan nāpratyayan tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti.
S06psp_5u:281_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānanadam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:281_1: imāny ānanda ṣaṣṭir bhikṣuśatāny anāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06psp_5u:281_3: teṣāṃ khalu punar ānandāvakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samasamo bhikṣusaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:281_6: viṃśativarṣasahasraṃ yato yato 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti abhiniṣkramya pravrajiṣyanti pravrajitvā yatra yatra vihariṣyanti tatra tatra pañcavarṇikānāṃ kusumānāṃ kusumavarṣāṇi pravarṣiṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:281_7: tasmāt tarhy ānanda uttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ tathāgatavihāreṇa vihartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:282_0: yo hi kaścit kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati niṣṭhā tenānanda kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ gantavyā manuṣyebhyo vāhaṃ cyutvehopapannas tuṣitād vā devanikāyā cyutvehopapanna iti,
S06psp_5u:282_2: 70) śrutā bhaviṣyati, tuṣiteṣu deveṣv iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa śrutā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:282_3: tathāgatavyavalokayitās te ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:283_0: yaḥ kaścid ānandan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyaty udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:283_1: bodhisattvayānikānāṃ vā pudgalānām imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyaty anuśāsiṣyati niṣṭhā tenānanda kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vānugantavyā saṃmukhaṃ mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām antikād iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutābhūt,
S06psp_5u:283_2: udgrahītā ca dhāritā ca vācitā ca paryavāptā cābhūt,
S06psp_5u:283_3: teṣu ca tathāgateṣv arhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kuśalamūlam avaropitam abhūt,
S06psp_5u:283_4: na śrāvakāṇām antike kuśalamūlam avaropitaṃ nāpi śrāvakāṇām antikād iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutveti.
S06psp_5u:284_0: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:284_1: arthataś ca dharmataś ca vinayataś cānugamiṣyati niṣṭhānanda tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vānugantavyā saṃmukhībhūto 'haṃ tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām iti,
S06psp_5u:285_0: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā na pratikrokṣyati na prativahiṣyati prasādaṃ pratilapsyate,
S06psp_5u:285_1: pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ sa ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā veditavyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:285_2: avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ, kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītaḥ, kiṃ cāpy ānanda yena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike kuśalamūlam avaropitaṃ sa na tad visaṃvādayiṣyati śrāvakatvāya vā pratyekabuddhatvāya vā.
S06psp_5u:285_3: api tu khalu punar ānanda supratisaṃviditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:285_4: dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā śīlapāramitāyāṃ caratā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caratā vīryapāramitāyāṃ caratā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā,
S06psp_5u:285_5: sarvaśūnyatāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv āryasatyeṣv apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣv abhijñāsu daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvitsv āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu caratā,
S06psp_5u:285_6: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caratā. supratisaṃvidito hy (PSP_5:71) ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāñ caran śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na śrāvakatvāya vā na pratyekabuddhatvāya vā sthāsyati.
S06psp_5u:285_7: tasmāt tarhy ānandānuparīndāmi ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ,
S06psp_5u:285_8: sacet punas tvaṃ ānanda yo mayā dharmo deśitaḥ sthāpitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvāntāṃ dharmadeśanām udgṛhya paryavāpya punar eva nāśayeḥ punar evotsṛjer na me tvam ānanda tāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ,
S06psp_5u:285_9: sacet tvam ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya ekapadam api nāśayer utsṛjes tāvatā me tvaṃ ānandāparāddhaḥ syāḥ,
S06psp_5u:285_10: sacet tvaṃ ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhya paryavāpya dve padam api punar eva nāśayeḥ punar evotsṛjes tāvatā me tvaṃ ānandāparāddhaḥ syāḥ.
S06psp_5u:285_11: tasmāt tarhy ānandānuparīndāmi te tathemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paṭheyam udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā bhavet,
S06psp_5u:285_12: tvayā ca suvyaktena suparigṛhītenākṣarapadavyañjanena suniruktā ca suparigṛhītā ca kartavyā.
S06psp_5u:286_0: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhir anuparigṛhītā bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:286_1: yo hy ānanda tarhi māṃ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā satkuryād gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhis teneyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā udgṛhītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā yoniśaś ca manasikartavyā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvan tu gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan tena pūjito bhavāmi,
S06psp_5u:286_2: atītānāgatapratyutpannāś ca buddhā bhagavantaḥ pūjitā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:287_0: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā,
S06psp_5u:287_1: imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā gauravaṃ ca prema ca prasādaṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:287_2: 72) cotpādayiṣyati atītānāgatapratyutpannanāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antike tena gauravañ ca prema ca prasādaś cotpādito bhaviṣyati yathā te 'ham ānanda priyaś ca manaāpaś cāparityaktaś ca tatheyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpāparityaktā bhavatu yathā ekapadam api ta ito gambhīrāyā prajñāpāramitāyā na nāśayitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:287_3: bahv api te 'ham ānanda bhāṣe prajñāpāramitāyā parīndanām ārabhya saṃkṣiptenānanda yādṛśas te 'haṃ śāstā tādṛśī te prajñāpāramitā śāstā,
S06psp_5u:287_4: tasmāt tarhy ānanda prajñāpāramitā yā apramāṇāni parīndanāni,
S06psp_5u:287_5: ahaṃ ca te ānandemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuparīndāmi,
S06psp_5u:287_6: tasmāt tarhy ānanda sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyārocayāmi yasyāparityakto buddho 'parityakto dharmo 'parityaktaḥ saṃgho 'parityaktā atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'parityaktānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhis tasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāparityaktā bhavatu,
S06psp_5u:288_0: yaḥ kaścid ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgṛhīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:288_1: pareṣāñ cemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām anekaparyāyeṇa vistareṇākhyāsyati deśayiṣyati prajñāpayiṣyati prasthāpayiṣyati vivariṣyati vibhajiṣyaty uttānīkariṣyati saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:288_2: sa khalu punar ānanda kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06psp_5u:288_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā nirjātā hy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatām anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:288_5: ye 'pi te ānandābhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām apy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā nirjātaivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:288_6: ye 'pi te bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās teṣām apy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā nirjātaivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:288_7: ye 'pi te ānandaitarhi pūrvasyān diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ vidikṣu daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti,
S06psp_5u:288_8: teṣām apy ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitā nirjātaivānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:288_9: tasmāt tarhy ānanda (PSP_5:73) bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbodhukāmena iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:288_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣā hy ānanda bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātājanayitrī yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:288_11: ye kecid ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyante sarve te niryāsyanty anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau.
S06psp_5u:288_12: tasmāt tarhy ānandemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayānuparīndāmi.
S06psp_5u:288_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? eṣā hy ānanda tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakośaḥ,
S06psp_5u:288_14: akṣayo hy eṣa kośo yad uta prajñāpāramitākośaḥ.
S06psp_5u:288_15: ye 'pi te ānanda pūrvasyāṃ diśi dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adha ūrdhvaṃ vidikṣu daśadiglokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ ca deśayanti te 'py ānanda buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitākośād deśayanti.
S06psp_5u:288_16: ye 'pi te ānandātīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhūvaṃs te 'py asyām eva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā dharman deśitavantaḥ.
S06psp_5u:288_17: ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'py asyām eva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyante dharmañ ca deśayiṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:288_18: ye 'pi te ānandātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śrāvakāḥ sarve te ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā parinirvṛtāś ca parinirvānti ca parinirvāsyanti ca.
S06psp_5u:289_0: sacet tvam ānanda śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmim ārabhya dharman deśayes tayā ca dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'rhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryur adyāpi tvayā mama śrāvakeṇa śrāvakakṛtyan na kṛtaṃ syāt.
S06psp_5u:289_1: sacet me tvam ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekam api prajñāpāramitā pratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ deśayeḥ prakāśayer,
S06psp_5u:289_4: tayā ca pūrvikayā dharmadeśanayā ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'pūrvācaramaṃ mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabheran mānuṣyakam ātmabhāvaṃ pratilabhyārhattvaṃ sākṣātkuryus teṣāñ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu.
S06psp_5u:289_5: (PSP_5:74) tat kiṃ manyase? tvam ānandāpi nu tat puṇyakriyāvastu bahu.
S06psp_5u:290_0: ānanda āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata.
S06psp_5u:291_0: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa ānanda bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06psp_5u:291_1: yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktan dharman deśayed antaśa ekadivasam api,
S06psp_5u:291_2: tiṣṭhatv ānanda ekadivasaṃ saced yāvad ardhadivasam api,
S06psp_5u:291_4: tiṣṭhatv ānanda purobhaktaṃ saced yāvan nālikāntaraṃ,
S06psp_5u:291_5: saced yāvat kṣaṇaṃ vā yāval lavaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:291_6: tiṣṭhatv ānanda lavam antaśo nimeṣamātram api,
S06psp_5u:291_7: ayaṃ ānanda tato bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06psp_5u:291_8: yaḥ śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktan dharman deśayet,
S06psp_5u:291_9: sa sarvaśrāvakayānikānāṃ sarvapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati.
S06psp_5u:291_10: saced ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharman deśayed antaśa ekadivasam apy ardhadivasam api purobhaktam api nālikāntaraṃ vā kṣaṇaṃ vā lavaṃ vā nimeṣamātram api,
S06psp_5u:291_11: ayam ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṛṇāṃ kuśalamūlam abhibhavati.
S06psp_5u:291_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa ātmanā cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ parāṃś cānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃpraharṣayati samuttejayati samādāpayati niveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_5u:291_13: evaṃ ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carañ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu caran samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgeṣu carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carann apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu carann āryasatyeṣu caran sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu carann abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu caran sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran kuśalamūlair vivardhamāno 'sthānam anavakāśo yad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ parihāsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
S06psp_5u:291_14: asyāṃ khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ catasraḥ pariṣado devamanuṣyayaksagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragāś ca saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣanṇā abhūvan.
S06psp_5u:292_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ puratas tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhi saṃskṛtenākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti sma,
S06psp_5u:292_1: bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ parṣady akṣobhyāyāṃ sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niḥkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptair bodhisattvayānikaiś ca pudgalaiḥ.
S06psp_5u:293_0: atha khalu bhagavān punar eva tam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ pratisaṃharati sma,
S06psp_5u:293_1: yenarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇa pratisaṃhṛtena tāś catasraḥ pariṣado na bhūyaḥ paśyanti sma.
S06psp_5u:293_2: tam aksobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śrāvakayānikā vā pratyekabuddhayānikā vā bodhisattvayānikā vā pudgalās tañ ca buddhakṣetram akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na bhūyaḥ paśyanti sma.
S06psp_5u:293_3: sa buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃgho na bhūyaś cakṣurindriyasyāvabhāsam āgacchati.
S06psp_5u:293_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? pratisaṃhṛto hi bhagavatā tathāgatena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāras tena bhūyo na paśyati sma.
S06psp_5u:294_0: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ ānandam āmantrayate sma:
S06psp_5u:294_1: evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmāś cakṣuṣo nābhāsam āgacchanti,
S06psp_5u:294_3: na dharmo dharmaṃ paśyati, na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. yathā punar eva so 'ksobhyas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas te ca śrāvakās te ca bodhisattvayānikāḥ kulaputrās tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ cakṣuṣo nābhāsam āgacchanti,
S06psp_5u:294_4: evaṃ hy ānanda sarvadharmāś cakṣuṣo nābhāsam āgacchanti,
S06psp_5u:294_6: na dharmo dharmaṃ paśyati, na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti. sarvadharmā hy ānandājānakā apaśyakā akriyāsamarthāḥ.
S06psp_5u:294_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? nirīhakā agrāhyā ānanda sarvadharmā agrāhyā nirīhakatayā,
S06psp_5u:294_9: avedakā hy ānanda sarvadharmā asāratām upādāya.
S06psp_5u:294_10: evañ carann ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyān na kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:294_11: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaś carati prajñāpāramitāyān na kaṃcid dharmam abhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:294_12: evaṃ (PSP_5:76) śikṣamāṇa ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate prajñāpāramitayāṃ sarvapāramitānuprāptukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:294_13: eṣā hi śikṣā yāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate 'nuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:294_14: sarvalokahitā sarvalokasukhā anāthānāṃ nāthakarī buddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā,
S06psp_5u:294_15: yatra sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinotkṣipya punar eva nikṣipeyur na ca teṣām evaṃ bhavati utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ nikṣipto veti.
S06psp_5u:294_16: tat kasya hetoḥ? iyaṃ sānanda prajñāpāramitāśikṣā yatra śikṣitvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatām atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu asaṅgajñānadarśanam utpannaṃ yāvatya ānanda śikṣāḥ sarvāsām ānanda śikṣānām iyaṃ prajñāpāramitāśikṣāgrākhyāyate jyeṣṭhākhyāyate śreṣṭhākhyāyate varākhyāyate pravarākhyāyate praṇītākhyāyate uttamākhyāyate 'nuttamākhyāyate niruttamākhyāyate,
S06psp_5u:294_17: ākāśasya ānanda pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā udgṛhītavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyeta.
S06psp_5u:294_18: tat kasya hetoḥ? apramāṇā hy ānanda prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:294_22: iti mahābodhiprāptaye puṇyabāhulyalakṣaṇaṃ tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇam ity uktāni kāraṇāni
S06psp_5u:295_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:296_0: bhagavān āha: akṣayatvād ānanda prajñāpāramitāpramāṇabaddhā viviktād ānanda prajñāpāramitā pramāṇabaddhā,
S06psp_5u:296_1: ye 'pi te ānandābhūvann atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvitā na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate,
S06psp_5u:296_2: ye 'pi te ānanda bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāviṣyante na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate,
S06psp_5u:296_3: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhi daśadiśi loke tathāgatā arhantaḥ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:296_4: 77) samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharman deśayanti te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva prajñāpāramitātaḥ prabhāvyante na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate.
S06psp_5u:296_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? ākāśaṃ sa ānanda kṣayituṃ manyeta yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṣayaṃ manyeta na ca prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣeṣyate,
S06psp_5u:296_6: na dhyānapāramitā kṣīyate na vīryapāramitā kṣīyate na kṣāntipāramitā kṣīyate na śīlapāramitā kṣīyate na dānapāramitā kṣīṇā kṣīyate kṣaṣyate,
S06psp_5u:296_7: adhyātmaśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate,
S06psp_5u:296_8: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
S06psp_5u:296_9: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
S06psp_5u:296_10: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
S06psp_5u:296_11: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante daśatathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddhadharmā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyante na kṣeṣyante,
S06psp_5u:296_12: sarvākārajñatā na kṣīṇā na kṣīyate na kṣeṣyate.
S06psp_5u:296_13: na hi teṣāṃ dharmāṇām utpādo 'sti yeṣām utpādo nāsti,
S06psp_5u:296_14: kutas teṣāṃ kṣayaḥ prajñāsyate? ity uktā kṣayānutpādajñānātmikā mahābodhiḥ
S06psp_5u:297_0: atha khalu bhagavāñ jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmya sarvāvantaṃ mukhamaṇḍalaṃ jihvendriyeṇācchādayitvāyuṣmantaṃ ānandam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:297_1: tat kiṃ manyase? ānandāpi nu īdṛśaṃ jihvendriyaṃ vitathavādi anyathāvādi syāt.
S06psp_5u:298_0: ānanda āha: na bhagavan na sugata.
S06psp_5u:299_0: bhagavān āha: tasmāt tarhy ānanda imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ vistareṇākhyāhi deśaya prajñāpaya prasthāpaya vibhaja vibhāvayottānīkuru saṃprakāśaya,
S06psp_5u:299_1: ihaivānanda gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvadharmā vistareṇopadiṣṭā yatra śrāvakayānikaiś ca pratyekabuddhayānikaiś ca bodhisattvayānikaiś ca pudgalaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:299_3: (PSP_5:78) iyaṃ punar ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvākṣarapraveśa sarvānakṣarapraveśā,
S06psp_5u:299_4: iyam ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā sarvadhāraṇīnāṃ mukhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:299_6: dhāraṇīṃ dhārayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvāḥ pratibhānapratisaṃvido bhaviṣyantiyam ānanda gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:299_8: tasmāt tarhy ānandārocayāmi te prativedayāmi te,
S06psp_5u:299_9: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiṃ dhārayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:299_10: iyaṃ sānanda prajñāpāramitā dhāraṇy uktā mayā,
S06psp_5u:299_11: tāṃ tvaṃ prajñāpāramitādhāraṇīṃ dhārayan sarvadharmān dhārayasi.
S06psp_5u:300_0: atha khalv āyuṣmataḥ subhūter etad abhavat:
S06psp_5u:301_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: akṣayā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_5u:302_0: bhagavān āha: ākāśākṣayatvāt subhūte akṣayā prajñāpāramitā.
S06psp_5u:304_6: evaṃ śīlapāramitākṣayatvāt kṣāntipāramitākṣayatvād vīryapāramitākṣayatvād dhyānapāramitākṣayatvāt prajñāpāramitākṣayatvāt subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:304_7: smṛtyupasthānākṣayatvena samyakprahāṇākṣayatvena ṛddhipādākṣayatvena indriyākṣayatvena balākṣayatvena bodhyaṅgākṣayatvenāryāṣṭāṅgamārgākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:304_10: 79) subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitākṣayatvena pañcābhijñākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:304_12: daśabalākṣayatvena caturvaiśāradyākṣayatvena pratisaṃvidakṣayatvenāṣṭādaśāveṇikābuddha dharmākṣayatvena subhūte prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:305_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte rūpākāśākṣayatvena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā,
S06psp_5u:305_22: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā ādyantavivarjitā,
S06psp_5u:305_23: āveṇiko 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmo bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yad evaṃ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayaty,
S06psp_5u:305_25: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:305_26: na sa śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:305_28: yaḥ kaścit subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā vivartiṣyaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06psp_5u:305_29: sa sarva imaṃ prajñāpāramitāmanasikāram anāgamya vivartiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:305_30: na saṃjñāsyate kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvenākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ? katham abhinirhartavya? iti.
S06psp_5u:305_31: ye kecit subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā vivartante sarve ta idam upāyakauśalyam anāgamya vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ.
S06psp_5u:305_32: ye kecit subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ sarve ta imāṃ prajñāpāramitām āgamya na vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher upāyakauśalyena.
S06psp_5u:305_33: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattven ākāśākṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā vyavalokayitavyā abhinirhartavyā.
S06psp_5u:306_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:306_1: ahetukam utpadyamānan na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:306_2: nirudhyamānan na kaṃcid dharmam ātmataḥ samanupaśyati na sattvato na jīvato na jantuto na poṣato na puruṣato na pudgalato na manujato na mānavato na kārakato notthāpakato na samutthāpakato na vedakato na vedāpakato na jānakato na jānāpakato na paśyakato na paśyāpakato,
S06psp_5u:306_3: na nityato nānityataḥ samanupaśyati na sukhato na duṣkhato nātmakato nānātmakato na śāntato nāśāntataḥ.
S06psp_5u:307_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratītyasamutpādo (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:307_2: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ carati tasmin samaye rūpaṃ na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:307_3: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:307_4: evaṃ vyastasamastān skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:307_8: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitān sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duṣkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:307_9: sarvākārajñatān na samanupaśyati nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā sukhaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ vā ātmā vā anātmā vā śāntaṃ vā aśāntaṃ vā śubhaṃ vā aśubhaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:307_10: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitān na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:307_11: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:307_17: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa yāvad dānapāramitāṃ samanupaśyet.
S06psp_5u:307_19: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaṃ samanupaśyet.
S06psp_5u:307_20: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:307_21: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ samanupaśyed āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīr na samanupaśyati,
S06psp_5u:307_22: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīḥ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:307_27: tam api dharman1 na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇa sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni samanupaśyet.
S06psp_5u:307_29: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇābhijñadaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidaḥ samanupaśyet.
S06psp_5u:307_31: tam api dharmān na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān samanupaśyet.
S06psp_5u:307_33: tam api dharman na samanupaśyati yena dharmeṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ samanupaśyet.
S06psp_5u:308_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānena.
S06psp_5u:308_1: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃ śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:308_2: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya mātāpitarau kālagatau bhavataḥ sa tena duṣkhena śokaśalyasamarpito bhavati parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ,
