S06psp_5u:308_3: evam eva subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ sarvadharmān anupalabhamānasya śokasalyasamarpito bhavati parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgataḥ.
S06psp_5u:309_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:309_1: eka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyena samanvāgato bhavati,
S06psp_5u:309_2: utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsas te sarve parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:309_4: bhagavān āha: sarva eva subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ parameṇa śokaśalyena samanvāgatā bhavanti,
S06psp_5u:309_6: yadā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇāvirahito bhavati,
S06psp_5u:309_7: evaṃ viharataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuraloko 'vatāran na labhate yatra gṛhītvā viheṭhayet,
S06psp_5u:309_8: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihartavyam.
S06psp_5u:309_9: ity uktam akṣayākāraṃ kṣayajñānam anutpādākāram anutpādajñānam
S06psp_5u:310_0: prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
S06psp_5u:310_6: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti
S06psp_5u:311_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:311_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
S06psp_5u:312_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:312_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan dānan dadāti,
S06psp_5u:312_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06psp_5u:312_3: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan śīlaṃ rakṣati,
S06psp_5u:312_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śīlapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06psp_5u:312_5: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan kṣāntyā saṃpādayati,
S06psp_5u:312_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06psp_5u:312_7: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan vīryam ārabhate,
S06psp_5u:312_8: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06psp_5u:312_9: iha subhūte bodhisatttvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:312_10: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06psp_5u:312_11: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayan prajñāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:312_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati.
S06psp_5u:313_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:313_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:314_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayataḥ sattveṣu maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ vākkarma maitraṃ manaḥkarma pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:314_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:315_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:316_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato yad idaṃ pratigrāhakā ākrośanti vā paribhāṣante vā,
S06psp_5u:316_2: na ca teṣām antike cittam āghātayati,
S06psp_5u:316_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:317_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan boddhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:318_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā danan dadatas te pratigrāhakā yady ākrośanti vā paribhāṣante vā asatyāṃ vā paruṣāṃ vā vācaṃ samudācaranti tasyākruṣyamāṇasya vā paribhāṣyamāṇasya vā,
S06psp_5u:318_1: asatyayā vā paruṣayā vā vācā samudācaryamāṇasya dānabuddhir eva bhavati,
S06psp_5u:318_3: dātavyañ caiva mayā dānan, na mayā na dātavyaṃ sa kāyikañ ca caitasikañ ca vīryaṃ sa vyañjanayati,
S06psp_5u:318_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:319_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:320_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato dānaṃ parityajataḥ sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayate,
S06psp_5u:320_1: na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā cittaṃ pariṇāmayaty,
S06psp_5u:320_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:321_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:322_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānan dadato dānaṃ parityajataḥ,
S06psp_5u:322_1: tasya māyābuddhir eva dāne pratyupasthitā bhavati,
S06psp_5u:322_2: tena ca dānena na kasyacit sattvasyopakāraṃ vāpakāraṃ vā paśyaty,
S06psp_5u:322_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā pprajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:323_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:323_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:324_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yaḥ kāyikaś ca vācikaś ca caitasikaś ca saṃvaras tena saṃvarena na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā parāmṛṣati,
S06psp_5u:324_1: tatra ca śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na sattvān jīvitād vyaparopayati,
S06psp_5u:324_2: nādattam ādadāti, na kāmeṣu mithyā carati, na mṛṣāvāg bhavati, na paruṣavāg bhavati na piśunāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣate,
S06psp_5u:324_3: na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati, nābhidhyālur bhavati, na vyāpannacitto bhavati, na mithyādṛṣṭir bhavati, sa tatra śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito yad dānan dadāty annam annārthikānāṃ pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ yānaṃ yānārthikānāṃ vastraṃ vastrārthikānāṃ mālyaṃ mālyārthikānāṃ vilepanaṃ vilepanārthikānāṃ śayanaṃ śayanārthikānām upāśrayam upāśrayārthikānāṃ pradīpaṃ pradīpārthikānāṃ upakaraṇam upakaraṇārthikānām anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti,
S06psp_5u:324_4: tac ca dānaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:324_5: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:324_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:325_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:326_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsatttvasya śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya sarvasattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā cchitvā gaccheyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ekacittotpādo 'pi na kṣubhyate na vyāpadyate 'nyatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:326_1: sulabdhā me lābhā (PSP_5:86) yatra hi nāma mama sattvā aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā cchitvā gaccheyur,
S06psp_5u:326_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:326_3: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:327_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kāyena na cittena vīryaṃ srasayati,
S06psp_5u:327_1: sarvasattvā mayottārayitavyāḥ saṃsārataḥ amṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:327_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:328_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:329_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:329_1: na ca śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vādhyālambate 'nyatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:329_2: iha mayā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā sarvasattvāḥ saṃsārād uttārayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:329_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:330_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:331_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthito na kañcid dharmaṃ saṃskṛtaṃ vāsaṃskṛtaṃ vā paśyati,
S06psp_5u:331_2: na kasyacid dharmasyāsti tvaṃ vā nāsti tvaṃ vā paśyaty anyatra sarvadharmatathatān na vyativartante,
S06psp_5u:331_3: tayā ca prajñāpāramitayopāyakauśalyena na śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pataty,
S06psp_5u:331_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:332_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:332_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:333_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:333_1: 87) prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya sarvasattvā yady ākrośayeyuḥ paribhāṣerann aṅgapratyaṅgāni cācchidyus tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitasyaivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:333_3: na mayaiteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dānaṃ na dātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:333_4: sa teṣāṃ sattvānām annam annārthikānāṃ dadāti,
S06psp_5u:333_5: pānaṃ pānārthikānāṃ dadāti, yānaṃ yānārthikānāṃ dadāti, śayanāsanavastrahiraṇyasuvarṇamaṇimuktāvaiḍūryamarakataśaṃkhaśilāpravālavajrendranīlasarvaratnaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārādīni dadāti yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi pariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti,
S06psp_5u:333_6: tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvasādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:333_7: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
S06psp_5u:333_8: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:334_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo nmahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:335_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣanṇo 'trāntare na kaścit sattvo jīvitād vyaparopito na daihikī bodhyaṅgatāghātadoṣakriyā vā utpāditā,
S06psp_5u:335_1: nādattam ādadāti, na kāmamithyācārī bhavati, na mṛṣāvāg bhavati, na paruṣavāg bhavati, na piśunavāg bhavati, nābaddhapralāpī bhavati, nābhidhyālur bhavati, na vyāpannacitto bhavati, na mithyādṛṣṭir bhavati, na cāsya srāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau cittaṃ krāmati,
S06psp_5u:335_2: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:335_3: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
S06psp_5u:335_4: ka eṣa pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:336_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:337_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:337_2: nāhaṃ yojanaṃ vā gatvā yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā yojanakoṭī niyutaśatasahasraṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:337_3: lokadhātuṃ vā lokadhātuśataṃ vā lokadhātusahasraṃ vā lokadhātuśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātuniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśataṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīsahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā tatrāntaśa ekasattvam api śaraṇagamanaśikṣāpadeṣu na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ srotaāpattiphale vā sakṛdāgāmiphale vā anāgāmiphale vā arhattvaphale vā na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ pratyekabodhau vā na pratiṣṭhāpayeyam anuttarāyāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhau na pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:337_4: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
S06psp_5u:337_5: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānatipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:338_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:339_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:339_4: utpannotpannāṃś cittacetasikān dharmān kuśalamūlopasaṃhitān sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇān kṛtvā sarvākārajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:339_5: tathā ca pariṇāmayati, yathā dhyānāni ca dhyānāṅgāni ca tasmin samaye nopalabhate.
S06psp_5u:339_6: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:340_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:341_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā tasmin samaye dharme dharmānupaśyī viharati,
S06psp_5u:341_1: viviktavihāreṇa vā śāntākāreṇa vākṣayākāreṇa vā na ca tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06psp_5u:341_2: yāvac ca na bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇo bhavati,
S06psp_5u:341_5: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:341_6: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
S06psp_5u:341_7: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:341_8: tathā ca parigṛhṇāti yathā nodgṛhṇāti tāvan notsṛjati.
S06psp_5u:342_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:342_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:343_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kāyena cittena caran na nikṣipati,
S06psp_5u:343_3: sattvānāṃ ca kṛtena yojanaṃ vā yojanaśataṃ vā yojanasahasraṃ vā yojanaśatasahasraṃ vā yojanakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātuṃ vā lokadhātuśataṃ vā lokadhātusahasraṃ vā lokadhātuśatasahasraṃ vā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā gatvā vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvāntaśa ekasattvam apy anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:343_4: saced bodhisattvayānikaṃ pudgalaṃ labheta taṃ bodhicaryāsu pratiṣṭhāpayati.
S06psp_5u:343_7: antaśa ekasattvam api daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayati,
S06psp_5u:343_8: sa tad dharmadānaṃ dattvā āmiṣadānena sattvān saṃtarpayati.
S06psp_5u:343_9: sa tat kuśalamūlaṃ na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
S06psp_5u:343_10: anyatra sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:343_11: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
S06psp_5u:343_12: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:344_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:344_2: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya,
S06psp_5u:344_54: sa tayā śīlapāramitayā na kāmadhātuṃ prārthayati,
S06psp_5u:344_55: na rūpadhātuṃ prārthayati, nārūpyadhātuṃ prārthayati, na śrāvakabhūmiṃ prārthayati,
S06psp_5u:344_57: anyatra tat kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:344_58: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na pravartate,
S06psp_5u:344_59: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:345_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:346_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya manuṣyabhūto vāmanuṣyabhūto vā cittavikṣepaṃ vā kuryād aṅgapratyaṅgāni cchitvā ādāya gacchet,
S06psp_5u:346_1: tatra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitasya naivaṃ bhavati,
S06psp_5u:346_2: ko me cchinatti vā bhinatti vā harati vā,
S06psp_5u:346_3: 'nyatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, sulabdhā me lābhā yeṣām evāham arthāya kāyaṃ pariharāmi,
S06psp_5u:346_6: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni na śrāvakabhūmau vā na pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayaty,
S06psp_5u:346_7: anyatra sarva sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:346_8: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:346_9: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.

S06psp_5u:348_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:348_1: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:348_3: smṛtimān saṃprajānaṃ sukhaṃ ca kāye na (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:348_5: upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:348_6: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhañ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.

S06psp_5u:348_10: sa sarvasattveṣu sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñāmanasikārād upekṣām apramāṇām upasaṃpadya viharati.

S06psp_5u:348_12: sa vijñāne śāntasaṃjñāyā manasikārād vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:348_13: sa ākiṃcanyāyataneṣu śāntasaṃjñāmanasikārād ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:348_14: sa naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyāḥ śāntasaṃjñāyā manasikārād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:348_15: sa teṣām apramāṇānāñ cārūpyasamāpattīnāṃ ca vipākan na pratigṛhṇāty,
S06psp_5u:348_17: tatropapadyate sa tān sattvān ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu paripācayati dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ,
S06psp_5u:348_19: buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāste paripṛcchati paripraśnīkurute kuśalamūlāvaropanatayā,
S06psp_5u:348_20: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:348_21: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:348_22: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:349_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:350_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā na dānapāramitān dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato na śīlapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato,
S06psp_5u:350_1: na kṣāntipāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato,
S06psp_5u:350_2: na vīryapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato,
S06psp_5u:350_3: (PSP_5:93) dhyānapāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittato,
S06psp_5u:350_4: na prajñāpāramitāṃ dravyataḥ samanupsaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ.
S06psp_5u:350_5: evaṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgāni mārgaṃ na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06psp_5u:350_6: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06psp_5u:350_7: āryasatyāprmāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattīr na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06psp_5u:350_8: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni pañcābhijñā na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06psp_5u:350_9: sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhāni na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06psp_5u:350_10: daśabalaviśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06psp_5u:350_11: sarvākārajñatān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ,
S06psp_5u:350_12: sarvadharmān na dravyataḥ samanupaśyati na bhāvato na nimittataḥ.
S06psp_5u:350_13: sa evaṃ paśyan na kvacid dharmaniketaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:350_14: sa yathā vādī tathā kārī ca bhavati,
S06psp_5u:350_15: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:350_16: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:350_17: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ sthitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.

S06psp_5u:351_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?

S06psp_5u:352_1: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc caitasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.

S06psp_5u:352_7: tatra dhyānapāramitāyāṃ sthito 'vikṣiptamānasas teṣāṃ sattvānām āmiṣadānaṃ dharmadānaṃ ca dadāti,

S06psp_5u:361_1: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati?
S06psp_5u:362_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati.
S06psp_5u:362_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā iti samanupaśyati? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann adhyātmaśūnyatādhyātmaśūnyateti nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:362_4: sa āsu śūnyatāsu sthitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpan nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_5: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ nopalabhate śūnyam iti vā aśūnyam iti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_6: skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_7: pratītyasamutpādaṃ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vā nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_8: sarvapāramitā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_9: smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_10: āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo nopalabhate sūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_12: śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni nopalabhate śūnyānīti vā aśūnyānīti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_13: abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmā nopalabhate śūnyā iti vā aśūnyā iti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_14: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir nopalabhate śūnyeti vā aśūnyeti vā,
S06psp_5u:362_15: saṃskṛto vā dhātur asaṃskṛto vā dhātur nopalabhate śūnya iti vā aśūnya iti vā.
S06psp_5u:362_16: sa iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadyad eva dānan dadāty annaṃ vā pānaṃ vā śayanaṃ vā āvasathaṃ vā glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ vā vastraṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā maṇimuktāśaṅkhaśilāpravālādīni vā puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapaṭākā vā yāvad anyatarānyatarāṇi mānuṣyakāṇi pariṣkāropakaraṇāni dadāti.
S06psp_5u:362_17: sa tad dānaṃ śūnyam ity aśūnyam iti nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:362_18: yo vā dadāti yasyaivā dadāti tad api śūnyam iti aśūnyam iti nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:362_19: tasya mātsaryacittasya codgrahacittasya vāvakāśo na bhavati.
S06psp_5u:362_20: tat kasya hetoḥ? sarva ete dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:362_21: 98) vikalpā eva bhavanti, prathamacittotpadam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yathā caiva tathāgatasyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhasya na mātsaryacittaṃ vodgrahacittaṃ votpadyate,
S06psp_5u:362_22: tathaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato mātsaryacittaṃ vā udgrahacittaṃ vā nopapadyate,
S06psp_5u:362_23: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ śāstā yad uta prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:362_24: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:362_25: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:362_26: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:363_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:364_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsatttvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā na śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmicittānām avakāśaṃ dadāti.
S06psp_5u:364_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmin nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:364_2: tad api cittan nopalabhate, yac chrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:364_8: ye 'pi cānye prāṇātipātāt prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_5u:364_9: evam adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paruṣavacanāt piśunavacanād abaddhapralāpād abhidhyāyā vyāpādāt,
S06psp_5u:364_13: ye 'pi cānye mithyādṛṣṭeḥ prativiratā bhavanti teṣām api varṇavādī bhavati samanujñaḥ.
S06psp_5u:364_14: tena ca śīlena na kaścid dharmaṃ parāmṛśati śrāvakatvaṃ vā pratyekabuddhatvaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:364_15: prāg evānyad vā tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattveṣu sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:364_16: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:364_17: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā (PSP_5:99) pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:365_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:366_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitasyānulomikī kṣāntir utpadyate,
S06psp_5u:366_1: tasyaivaṃ bhavati, iha na kaścid dharma utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā mriyate vā ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā tasya prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvad bodhimaṇḍaniṣaṇṇasya yadi sarvasattvā āgamyākroṣayur vā paribhāṣeran vā loṣṭadaṇḍaśastraprahārān dadyuś cchidyur bhidyur vā,
S06psp_5u:366_2: tatra cāsyaivaṃ bhavati, aho dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā, na iha kaścid dharma ākruṣyate vā paribhāṣyate vā cchidyate vā bhidyate vā hanyate vā,
S06psp_5u:366_3: sa tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:366_4: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:366_5: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā parinamayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:367_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigarhnāti?
S06psp_5u:368_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā caturbhir ṛddhipādair upāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kāyikañ ca caitasikañ ca vīryaṃ saṃjanayyānyaṃ lokadhātum api gatvā,
S06psp_5u:368_1: lokadhātuśatam api gatvā, lokadhātusahasram api gatvā lokadhātuśatasahasram api gatvā lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasram api gatvā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06psp_5u:368_14: tathā ca pratiṣṭhāpayati, yathā na saṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:368_15: nāsaṃskṛte dhātau pratiṣṭhāpayati tac ca kuśalamūlaṃ sarvasattveṣu (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:368_17: tathā ca pariṇāmayati, yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:368_18: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:369_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti?
S06psp_5u:370_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā,
S06psp_5u:370_2: yāvantaḥ kecit samādhayaḥ śrāvakasamādhir vā pratyekabuddhasamādhir vā tān sarvān samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,
S06psp_5u:370_3: samādhau sthitvā aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
S06psp_5u:370_4: katamān aṣṭau vimokṣān? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyaty,
S06psp_5u:370_5: ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ. adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhārūpāṇi paśyaty ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ.
S06psp_5u:370_6: śūnyatvenādhimuktaḥ śūnyatve cādhimukto bhavaty ayaṃ tṛtīyo vimokṣaḥ.
S06psp_5u:370_7: sukhasya ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_8: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamād nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06psp_5u:370_9: ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06psp_5u:370_10: ayaṃ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramād ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06psp_5u:370_11: ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06psp_5u:370_12: ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ. sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikramāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharaty,
S06psp_5u:370_13: ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ. itīmān aṣṭau vimokṣān anulomaṃ pratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,
S06psp_5u:370_14: tatra samādhau sthitvā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
S06psp_5u:370_15: katamā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:370_16: 101) savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:370_17: vitarkavicārāṇāṃ vyupaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:370_18: prīteś ca virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ kāye na pratisaṃvedayate,
S06psp_5u:370_19: yat tad āryā ācakṣate, upekṣakaḥ smṛtimān sukhavihārī tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_20: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duṣkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduṣkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhiṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_21: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamād nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_22: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanasamatikramād anantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_23: sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanasamatikramād nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiṃcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_24: sa sarvaśa ākiṃcanyāyatanasamatikramād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_25: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamatikrayāt saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:370_26: evam imā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca,
S06psp_5u:370_27: imān aṣṭa vimokṣān imāś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattīr vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvā imaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:370_28: tatra ca samādhau sthitvā dvādaśāṅgapratītyasamutpādam anulomapratilomaṃ pratyavekṣate.
S06psp_5u:370_29: katamāni dvādaśāṅgāni? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā iti pratyavekṣate,
S06psp_5u:370_30: evaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamb nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ,
S06psp_5u:370_31: sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavo, bhavapratyayā jātiḥ, jātipratyayaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ, jarāmaraṇapratyayāḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā iti pratyavekṣate.
S06psp_5u:370_32: evam asya kevalasya mahato duṣkhaskandhasya loke samudayo bhavatīti pratyavekṣate.
S06psp_5u:370_33: jarāmaraṇe tasminn asati śokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā na bhavantīti pratyavekṣate,
S06psp_5u:370_34: evaṃ jātāv asatyāṃ jarāmaraṇan na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:370_38: 102) na bhavati, vedanāyam asatyāṃ tṛṣṇā na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:370_44: avidyāyām asatyāṃ saṃskārā na bhavantīti pratyavekṣate.
S06psp_5u:370_45: evam asya kevalasya mahatā duṣkhaskandhasya loke nirodho bhavatīti pratyavekṣate.
S06psp_5u:370_46: evam imaṃ dvādaśāṅgaṃ pratītyasamutpādam anulomapratilomaṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06psp_5u:370_47: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ sādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:370_48: ko vā pariṇāmayati kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:370_49: kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitvā dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:371_0: katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya siṃhavijṛmbhitaḥ samādhir? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati.
S06psp_5u:371_2: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:371_3: ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattin naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:371_10: caturthād dhyānād vyutthāya tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:371_11: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthāya dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:371_12: dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate.
S06psp_5u:371_13: sa imaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ samādhiṃ vibhaṅgaṃ kṛtvāvaskandakaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate.
S06psp_5u:371_14: katamaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvaskandakaḥ samādhir? iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:371_15: 103) pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:371_16: prathamād dhyānād vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:371_17: dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthitas tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:371_18: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthitaś caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:371_19: caturthyād dhyānād vyutthita ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,
S06psp_5u:371_26: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpittiṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:371_39: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatānasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
S06psp_5u:371_58: sa ihāvaskandake samādhau sthitvā sarvadharmasamatām anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_5u:371_59: tāni ca kuśalamūlāni sarvasattvasādhāraṇāni kṛtvānuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati,
S06psp_5u:371_60: tathā ca pariṇāmayati yathāsya trividhā buddhir na bhavati,
S06psp_5u:371_61: ko vā pariṇāmayati, kiṃ vā pariṇāmayati, kutra vā pariṇāmayati. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vaskandakasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca.
S06psp_5u:372_0: subhūtir āha: bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacic chikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:373_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, bahuṣu sthāneṣu śikṣitavyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacic chikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:373_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te dharmā nopalabhyante yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:374_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:374_1: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena me saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca dharmā bhāṣitāḥ,
S06psp_5u:374_2: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhukāmenemāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ saṃkṣiptena ca vistareṇa ca paryavāptavyāḥ paryavāpya yāvad vācā parijitāḥ kartavyā yāvad vācā parijitāḥ kṛtvā manasā pratyavekṣitavyā,
S06psp_5u:374_3: tathā ca cittacetasikā dharmā na pravartante,
S06psp_5u:374_4: asmin punaḥ saṃkṣepavistare śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṇnāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāñ ca saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:375_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:376_0: bhagavān āha: rūpasya vā vedanāyā vā saṃjñāyā vā saṃskārāṇāṃ vā vijñānasya vā saṃkṣiptavistarañ ca tathatāṃ jānānaḥ.
S06psp_5u:376_1: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ vā saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ tathatāṃ jānānaḥ,
S06psp_5u:376_2: evaṃ sarvapāramitānāṃ vā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhānāṃ vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ vā sarvākārajñatāyā vā saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ tathatāṃ jānānaḥ,
S06psp_5u:377_0: subhūtir āha: katamā sā bhagavaṃs tathatā?
S06psp_5u:378_0: bhagavān āha: yasyās tathatāyā notpādaḥ prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:378_1: na sthitir nānyathātvaṃ prajñāyate iyaṃ sā tathatā yatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:378_2: evaṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:379_0: subhūtir āha: katamā sā bhagavan bhūtakoṭiḥ?
S06psp_5u:379_1: bhagavān āha: akoṭir bhūtakoṭir atra koṭyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati,
S06psp_5u:379_2: evaṃ dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:381_0: bhagavān āha: ākāśadhātur dharmadhātur yasya dhātor na cchedaḥ prajñāyate na paricchedaḥ.
S06psp_5u:381_1: evaṃ ca dharmadhātuṃ jānāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:382_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣiptavistaraṃ jñātavyam?
S06psp_5u:383_0: bhagavān āha: yathā sarvadharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ.
S06psp_5u:384_0: subhūtir āha: katame bhagavan sarvadharmā ye na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ?
S06psp_5u:385_0: bhagavān āha: rūpan na saṃyuktaṃ na visaṃyuktaṃ,
S06psp_5u:385_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, vijñānan na saṃyuktan na visaṃyuktam,
S06psp_5u:385_2: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca na saṃyuktāni na (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:385_3: 106) visaṃyuktāni, evaṃ yāvat saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛto dhatur na saṃyukto na visaṃyuktaḥ.
S06psp_5u:385_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hy asyāsti svabhāvo yaḥ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā yaś cāsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo,
S06psp_5u:385_5: yaś cābhāvaḥ so 'bhāvena sārdhaṃ na saṃyukto na visaṃyukta,
S06psp_5u:386_0: subhūtir āha: ayaṃ punar bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyātra hi bhagavann abhisaṃkṣepapāramitāyām ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:386_2: ihaiva punar abhisaṃkṣepe śikṣimāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃkṣepavistaraṃ jñāsyati.
S06psp_5u:387_0: bhagavān āha: tīkṣṇendriyasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo,
S06psp_5u:387_3: kasyacin na praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāyaṃ praveśo,
S06psp_5u:387_4: na khalu kuśīdasyāyaṃ praveśo na hīnavīryasya muṣitasmṛter na vikṣiptacittasyāyaṃ praveśaḥ ārabdhavīryasyākuśīdasyopasthitasmṛter ayaṃ praveśaḥ śikṣitukāmasya cāvinivartanīyabhūmau sarvākārajñatām anuprāptukāmasya cāyaṃ praveśaḥ.
S06psp_5u:388_0: saced yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate śikṣitvā dānapāramitāṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:388_1: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgān anuprāpsyaty,
S06psp_5u:388_6: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicit mārakarmāṇy utpatsyante,
S06psp_5u:388_8: tasmād upāyakauśalyaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:388_9: yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:388_11: tasmin samaye 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:388_12: 107) ca deśayanti te taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samanvāharanti prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantam.
S06psp_5u:388_13: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi subhūte 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto yad uta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:388_14: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam,
S06psp_5u:388_15: aham apy enān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi ye tair atītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir anuprāptāḥ.
S06psp_5u:388_16: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ yogam āpattavyam,
S06psp_5u:388_17: evaṃ prayujyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
S06psp_5u:388_18: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāvirahitena bhavitavyam.
S06psp_5u:388_19: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyām antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:388_20: sa khhalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:388_21: na tv eva ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec chīle pratiṣṭhāpayet kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayed vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_5u:388_22: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06psp_5u:388_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi subhūte dānaśīlakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanāni srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:388_24: ye 'pi te buddhā bhagavanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:388_26: ye 'pi te subhūte ' tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'pīta eva prabhāvitā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ.
S06psp_5u:389_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā saṃvatsaraśataṃ vā kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyān api kalpāni māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair bhāvayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:389_2: na tv eva ye gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec chīle kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06psp_5u:389_5: anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet, arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet.
S06psp_5u:389_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? ato nirjātā hi te buddhā bhagavanto yair idaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastuprajñāptaṃ,
S06psp_5u:389_9: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prajñāptam.
S06psp_5u:390_0: yaḥ punar aparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_1: sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:390_3: upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:390_15: kuśalamūlair avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:390_19: vyākaraṇasaṃpanno gotrasaṃpannaḥ saṃcintyabhavaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:390_20: ākārapraveśakuśalo 'nakṣarapraveśakuśalo vyavahārakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:390_21: avyavahārakuśala ekādhivacanakuśalo dvyadhivacanakuśalas tryadhivacanakuśalaḥ puruṣādhivacanakuśalo rūpakuśalo,
S06psp_5u:390_22: vedanākuśalaḥ saṃjñākuśalaḥ saṃskārakuśalo vijñānakuśalaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādakuśalaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgakuśalo (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:390_23: 109) yāvan nirvāṇakuśalo dharmadhātulakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskāralakṣaṇakuśalaḥ saṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalo 'saṃskṛtalakṣaṇakuśalo lakṣaṇālakṣaṇakuśalo bhāvakuśalo 'bhāvakuśalaḥ svabhāvakuśalaḥ parabhāvakuśalaḥ sayogakuśalo viyogakuśalaḥ saṃprayuktakuśalo viprayuktakuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_24: tathatākuśalo 'vitathatākuśalo 'nanyatathatākuśalo dharmatākuśalo dharmadhātukuśalo dharmaniyāmatākuśalo dharmasthititākuśalo bhūtakoṭikuśalaḥ pratyayakuśalaḥ saṃpratyayakuśalo dhyānakuśalo 'pramāṇakuśala ārūpyasamāpattikuśalaḥ ṣaṭpāramitākuśalaś catuḥsmṛtyupasthānakuśalaḥ samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgakuśalo vimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhakuśalaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitakuśalo 'bhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmakuśalaḥ sarvākārajñatākuśalaḥ saṃskṛtadhātukuśalo 'saṃskṛtadhātukuśalo 'dhātukuśalo rūpamanasikārakuśalo vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānamanasikārakuśalaḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādapratītyasamutpādāṅgamanasikārakuśalaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣya dharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhamanasikārakuśalaḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmamanasikārakuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_27: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_33: bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodhipakṣyair dharmaiḥ śūnyāḥ iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_40: aṣṭādaśāveṇikabuddhadharmā aṣṭādaśāveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā iti kuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_42: 110) śūnyeti kuśalaḥ, pratiprasrabdhamārgakuśalo 'pratiprasrabdhamārgakuśalaḥ utpādanirodhakuśalaḥ sthityanyathātvakuśalo rāgakuśalo dveṣakuśalo mohakuśalo dṛṣṭikuśalo 'dṛṣṭikuśalo mithyādṛṣṭikuśalo 'mithyādṛṣṭikuśalo yāvat sarvadṛṣṭikuśalo nāmarūpakuśalo 'nāmarūpakuśala ārambaṇakuśala ādhipatyakuśalo hetukuśalaḥ pratyayakuśalo lakṣaṇakuśalo 'lakṣaṇakuśalo duḥkhakuśalo 'duḥkhakuśalaḥ samudayakuśalo 'samudayakuśalo nirodhakuśalo mārgakuśalo narakakuśalo narakamārgakuśalaḥ tiryagyonikuśalas tiryagyonimārgakuśalo yamalokakuśalo yamalokamārgakuśalo manuṣyakuśalo manuṣyamārgakuśalo devakuśalo devamārgakuśalaḥ srotaāpattiphalakuśalaḥ srotaāpattiphalamārgakuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_50: tīkṣṇamārgakuśalo javanaprajñākuśalo nairvedhikaprajñākuśalaḥ pṛthakpṛthakprajñākuśalo samantaprajñākuśalo 'tītārthakuśalo 'nāgatārthakuśalaḥ pratyutpannārthakuśala upāyakuśalaḥ sattvāśayakuśalo 'dhyāśayakuśalo 'rthakuśalo vyañjanakuśalas tristhānavyavasthānakuśalaḥ,
S06psp_5u:390_51: itīme 'nuśaṃsāḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ.
S06psp_5u:393_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyaṃ? kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhinirhartavyā? kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā?
S06psp_5u:394_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaśāntatayā subhūte rūpavaśikatayā rūpatucchatayā rūpāsāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:394_1: vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānaśāntatayā vijñānavaśikatayā vijñānatucchatayā vijñānāsāratayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:394_2: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ śāntatayā vaśikatayā tucchatayā (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:397_0: subhūtir āha: kiyac ciraṃ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cīrṇo bhavati?
S06psp_5u:400_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavaṃś cittāntarānām avakāśan dadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:401_0: bhagavān āha: anyeṣāṃ subhūte manasikārāṇām avakāśam adadatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:402_1: tathā ca caritavyā tathā cābhinirhartavyā tathā ca bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:403_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitām abhinirharan prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:404_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti samyaksaṃbodher amanasikāravikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:405_0: subhūtir āha: bhāvayan punaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:406_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti bhāvanāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:407_0: subhūtir āha: abhāvayan punaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:408_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. ity abhāvanāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:409_0: subhūtir āha: naiva bhāvayan nābhāvayan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:410_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte. iti naivabhāvanānābhāvanāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:411_0: subhūtir āha: tat kathaṃ bhagavan sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:415_0: bhagavān āha: yathā dharmadhātuḥ. iti yathāvikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:417_0: bhagavān āha: yathātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ.
S06psp_5u:418_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan tathatā bhūtakoṭidharmadhātur ātmadhātuḥ sattvadhātur jīvadhātur jantudhātuḥ poṣadhātuḥ puruṣadhātuḥ pudgaladhātuḥ?
S06psp_5u:419_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu sa ātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā jantur vā poso vā puruṣo vā pudgalo vā upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:421_0: bhagavān āha: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte ātmānaṃ vā sattvaṃ vā jīvaṃ vā jantuṃ vā poṣaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā pudgalaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:421_1: kathaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vā yāvat pudgaladhātuṃ vā prajñāpayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:421_2: evaṃ prajñāpāramitām apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvadharmān apy aprajñapayamānaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati.
S06psp_5u:422_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann aprajñapanīyā prajñāpāramitā? aprajñapanīyā dhyānapāramitā,
S06psp_5u:423_1: yāvat sarvadharmāḥ saṃskṛtā vāsaṃskṛtā vā śrāvakadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā yāvad buddhadharmā vā.
S06psp_5u:424_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann aprajñapanīyāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:424_2: tiryagyonigatāḥ prajñāyante, yamalokā vā prajñāyante, manuṣyā vā prajñāyante, devā vā prajñāyante, srotaāpannā vā sakṛdāgāmino vānāgāmino vārhanto vā pratyekabuddhā vā samyaksaṃbuddhā vā prajñāyante.
S06psp_5u:425_0: bhagavān āha: kat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu sattvaprajñāptir upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:427_0: bhagavān āha: anupalabhamānaḥ subhūte sattvaṃ kuto nārakaṃ prajñāpayiṣyati tiryagyonigatān,
S06psp_5u:427_1: yamalokaṃ vā manuṣyaṃ vā devaṃ vā srotaāpannān vā sakṛdāgāmino vā anāgāmino vā arhato vā pratyekabuddhān vā samyaksaṃbuddhān vā kutaḥ prajñāpayiṣyati? evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāprajñapanīyeṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:428_0: subhūtir āha: na nu bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:428_2: vijñāne śikṣitavyaṃ, skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādeṣu pratītyasamutpādāṅgeṣu ca śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:429_0: bhagavān āha: rūpeṣu subhūte śikṣitavyam anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā,
S06psp_5u:430_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpe anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā śikṣitavyaṃ? vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu,
S06psp_5u:430_1: kathaṃ bhagavan vijñāne 'nutkṣepāprakṣepatayā śikṣitavyaṃ? yāvat sarvākārajñatāyām anutkṣepāprakṣepatayā śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:432_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan anutpādato 'nirodhataḥ śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:434_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann anabhisaṃskāratayā śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:435_0: bhagavān āha: svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān samanupaśyann anabhisaṃskāratayā śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:436_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyāḥ sarvadharmā iti śikṣitavyam?
S06psp_5u:437_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:437_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyaṃ draṣṭavyam,
S06psp_5u:437_2: evaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo,
S06psp_5u:437_4: evaṃ rūpaṃ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmāḥ śabdagandharasasparṣṭavyadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:437_8: evaṃ śrotrasaṃsparśo ghrāṇasaṃsparśo jihvāsaṃsparśaḥ kāyasaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśo manaḥsaṃsparśena śūnyo draṣṭavyaḥ,
S06psp_5u:437_9: cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā cakṣuḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:437_14: manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayā vedanā manaḥsaṃsparśapratyayayā vedanayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:437_19: bahirdhāśūnyatā bahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatayā śūnyā draṣṭavyā,
S06psp_5u:437_37: āveṇikā buddhadharmā āveṇikaiḥ buddhadharmaiḥ śūnyā draṣṭavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:437_38: anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā draṣṭavyā.
S06psp_5u:437_39: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:438_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan rūpaṃ rūpeṇa śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:438_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ vijñānena śūnyam. evaṃ yāvad anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir anuttarayā samyaksaṃbodhyā śūnyā.
S06psp_5u:438_2: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carir bhavati?
S06psp_5u:439_0: bhagavān āha: acariḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācariḥ.
S06psp_5u:440_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavann acariḥ?
S06psp_5u:441_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte sā prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:441_2: carir api nopalabhyate, yo vā carito, yena vā carito, yatra vā caritas, tad api nopalabhyate. evaṃ hi subhūte acarir bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitācarir yatraite sarvaprapañcā nopalabhyante.
S06psp_5u:442_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan na cariḥ prajñāpāramitācarir bhavati,
S06psp_5u:442_1: tat kathaṃ bhagavann ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:443_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpādam upādāyānupalambheṣu sarvadharmeṣu śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:443_1: tena dānan dadatā (PSP_5:116) anupalambhayogena dānan dātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:443_17: āveṇikān buddhadharmān bhāvayatānupalambhayogena āveṇikā buddhadharmā bhāvayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:444_0: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavann upalambho bhavati? kiyatā bhagavann anupalambho bhavati?
S06psp_5u:445_0: bhagavān āha: yāvad dvayan tāvad upalambho, yāvad advayan tāvad anupalambhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:446_0: subhūtir āha: kiyatā bhagavan dvayaṃ vā advayaṃ vā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:447_0: bhagavān āha: yāvac cakṣurūpaṃ yāvat manodharmāś ca,
S06psp_5u:448_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann upalambho 'nupalambhaḥ, athānupalambha upalambhaḥ?
S06psp_5u:449_1: nāpy anupalambha upalambhaḥ, api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte upalambhānupalabdhisamatānupalambhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:449_2: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānupalambhasamatāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:449_3: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām anupalambhiko bhavati.
S06psp_5u:450_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran naivopalambhe sajjati nānupalambhe,
S06psp_5u:450_1: kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiḥ paripūrayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:451_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann upalambhe sthitvā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayati,
S06psp_5u:451_1: na copalarabhe sthitvā śaktyā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bhūmer bhūmiṃ paripūrayitum.
S06psp_5u:451_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? anupalambhā hi prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:451_3: anupalambhā hi bodhiḥ, so 'pi nopalabhyate yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:451_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:452_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nopalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:452_1: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāñ caratā dharmeṣu pravicayaḥ kartavyaḥ? idaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:452_2: iyaṃ vedanā, iyaṃ saṃjñā, ime saṃskārā, idaṃ vijñānam, imāni skandhadhātvāyatanāni, ayaṃ pratītyasamutpāda, imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
S06psp_5u:452_3: imā pāramitāḥ, imāni śūnyatāmukhāni, ime bodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ, imā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayaḥ,
S06psp_5u:452_7: ime āveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ, iyam anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ.
S06psp_5u:453_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tathā dharmeṣu pravicayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:453_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārān, vijñānaṃ nopalabhate, skandhadhātvāyatanāni nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:453_5: pāramitā nopalabhate, śūnyatāmukhāni nopalabhate, bodhipakṣyān dharmān nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:454_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāñ caran rūpaṃ nopalabhate,
S06psp_5u:454_1: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān, vijñānan nopalabhate, yāvad anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhin nopalabhate.
S06psp_5u:454_2: tat kathaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrya śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrya kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrya vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrya dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrya prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:454_5: sattvān paripācya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati sarvākārajñatām anuprāpya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:455_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo rūpasya kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:455_1: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_5u:455_3: na skandhadhātvāyatanānāṃ na pratītyasamutpādasya na pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ kṛtena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:455_4: na pāramitānāṃ kṛtena, na śūnyatāmukhānāṃ na bodhipakṣyānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtena,
S06psp_5u:456_0: subhūtir āha: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:457_0: bhagavān āha: na kasyacit kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:457_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte 'kṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:457_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam akṛtāvikṛtānabhisaṃskṛtānabhisaṃskārayogena.
S06psp_5u:458_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann akṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:458_1: kathaṃ yeṣāṃ bhagavaṃs trayāṇāṃ yānānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati? śrāvakayānasya pratyekabuddhayānasya mahāyānasya ca.
S06psp_5u:459_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte 'kṛtānām avikṛtānām anabhisaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kiṃcid vyavasthānam upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:459_1: anabhisaṃskṛtānām anabhisaṃcetayitānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavasthānaṃ ca nopalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:459_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bālo 'śrutavān pṛthagjano rūpe 'bhiniviṣṭo,
S06psp_5u:459_7: pāramitāsv abhiniviṣṭaḥ, śūnyatāmukhesv abhiniviṣṭo, bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣv abhiniviṣṭaḥ,
S06psp_5u:459_13: vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān, vijñānaṃ manyate vijñānam upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:459_19: bodhipakṣyān dharmān manyate bodhipakṣyān dharmān upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:459_27: tasyaivaṃ bhavaty, ahaṃ bodhim abhisaṃbhotsye, ahaṃ sattvān parimocayiṣyāmi saṃsārataḥ.
S06psp_5u:459_28: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yad buddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:459_29: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ nopalabdhaṃ, skandhadhātvāyatanāni pratītyasamutpādaḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca nopalabdhāni,
S06psp_5u:459_34: tatsamohapuruṣo buddhvā vākhyāya sattvān icchati saṃsārāt parimocayitum.
S06psp_5u:460_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:460_1: yad bhagavān evam āha, tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena pañcabhiś cakṣurbhir nopalabdhās te sattvā yān āsaṃsārāt parimocayed iti.
S06psp_5u:460_2: tat katham idānīṃ bhagavatānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ samyaktvaniyatā vā mithyātvaniyatā vāniyatā vā?
S06psp_5u:461_0: bhagavān āha: na mayā subhūte 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya kathaṃcid api sattva upalabdhaḥ,
S06psp_5u:461_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ya ime sattvā adravye dravyasaṃjñinas tāṃs tato abhūtagrahād dhārayāmi lokavyavahāreṇa naḥ punaḥ paramārthena.
S06psp_5u:462_0: subhūtir āha: na punar bhagavatā paramārthe sthitvā bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā?
S06psp_5u:464_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavatā naiva paramārthe sthitvānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbuddhā,
S06psp_5u:464_2: katham idānīṃ bhagavatā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bodhir abhisaṃbuddhā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:465_0: bhagavān āha: anabhisaṃbuddhā subhūte tathāgatenānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06psp_5u:465_1: sā ca na kvacit sthitā saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau.
S06psp_5u:465_2: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgatanirmito na kvacit sthitaḥ saṃskṛte vā dhātāv asaṃskṛte vā dhātau,
S06psp_5u:465_3: sa ca tathāgatanirmito gacchati cāgacchati ca tiṣṭhati ca niṣīdati ca,
S06psp_5u:465_4: sa dānapāramitāyāṃ carec, chīlapāramitāyāṃ caret, kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ cared, vīryapāramitāyāṃ cared, dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caret, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carec, catvāri dhyānāny upasaṃpadya viharec,
S06psp_5u:465_5: caturbhir apramāṇaiś catasṛbhir ārūpyasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhiś caturbhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiś caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiś caturbhir ṛddhipādaiḥ pañcabhir indriyaiḥ pañcabhir balaiḥ saptabhir bodhyaṅgair āryāṣṭāṅgena mārgeṇa śūnyatāsamādhinā animittasamādhināpraṇihitasamādhinā (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:465_7: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhir daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhiḥ mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā samādhidhāraṇīmukhair aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair dharmacakrapravartanatayā ca viharet,
S06psp_5u:465_8: sa ca nirmito 'parimāṇān sattvān abhinirmāya triṣu rāśiṣu vyākuryāt.
S06psp_5u:465_9: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte 'pi nu tena kaścit sattvas triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtaḥ.
S06psp_5u:467_0: bhagavān āha: evam eva subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā nirmitopamā jñātā,
S06psp_5u:467_1: na ca kaścit sattvo vinītaḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:468_0: subhūtir āha: api nu bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamāḥ.
S06psp_5u:469_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat.
S06psp_5u:470_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmā nirmitopamās tathāgatasya nirmitasya ca kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ? kiṃ vā nānākaraṇaṃ? ko vābhiprāyaḥ?
S06psp_5u:471_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:471_1: tathāgatasya ca subhūte nirmitasya ca na kaścid viśeṣo,
S06psp_5u:471_3: nirviśeṣaḥ subhūte tathāgataś ca nirmitaś ca.
S06psp_5u:471_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yat tathāgataḥ karma karoti,
S06psp_5u:472_0: subhūtir āha: kaccit punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate nirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06psp_5u:474_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ yathā punar bhagavan na sati tathāgate tathāgatanirmitaḥ karma karoti?
S06psp_5u:475_0: bhagavān āha: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sacet tathāgato bhavyasattvam anupalabhamāno nirmitan nirmāya parinirvṛtaḥ,
S06psp_5u:475_1: tena ca nirmitenārdhakalpaṃ buddhakṛtyaṃ sa paścād buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā parinirvṛta iti janaḥ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:475_2: na ca nirmitānāṃ kaścid utpādo na nirvāṇam.
S06psp_5u:475_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:476_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan nirmitasya tathāgatasya ca viśeṣo nāsti dakṣiṇā pariśuddhiḥ kathaṃ bhaviṣyati? ya ime bhagavaṃs tathāgate dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:476_1: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyante,
S06psp_5u:476_2: evam eva ye nirmite dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti,
S06psp_5u:476_3: sā na jātu kṣīyate yāvat te sattvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyanti.
S06psp_5u:477_0: bhagavān āha: yayā subhūte dharmatayā tathāgataḥ sadevakasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyo bhavati,
S06psp_5u:477_1: tayaiva dharmatayā nirmito 'pi sadevasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:477_3: tiṣṭhatu nirmitapratiṣṭhāpitā dakṣiṇā yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataṃ maitratayā manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:477_4: sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati.
S06psp_5u:477_5: tiṣṭhatu maitraṃ vā manasikāro yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ākāśe puṣpāṇi kṣepsyati tathāgataṃ manasikṛtvā sarvo 'sau tasya kuśalamūlasya paryantam adhigamya duṣkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyati:
S06psp_5u:477_7: tiṣṭhatv ākāśe puṣpāṇi yaḥ kaścit subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā namo buddhānām iti manasikariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:477_10: evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā, tad anena te subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:477_11: tathāgatasya ca tathāgatanirmitasya ca na kiṃcit nānākaraṇam upalabhyate dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtyam.
S06psp_5u:478_0: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:478_4: evaṃ dhyānapāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ śīlapāramitāyā iyaṃ dānapāramitāyā dharmateti na vikopayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:478_5: evaṃ yāvat sarvadharmeṣv ime sarvadharmā iyaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmateti na vikopayitavyā.
S06psp_5u:479_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan sarvadharmāṇān dharmatā na vikopayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:479_1: yat punar bhagavaṃs tathāgatena vikopitaṃ rūpam idam,
S06psp_5u:479_2: iyaṃ vedanā (PSP_5:123) iyaṃ saṃjñā, ime saṃskārā, idaṃ vijñānaṃ, ime skandhā, ime dhātavaḥ, imāny āyatanāni, ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādaḥ, imāni pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni,
S06psp_5u:479_4: evaṃ kuśalā dharmā evam akuśalā dharmāḥ sāsravā anāsravā laukikā lokottarās sādhāraṇā asādhāraṇāḥ saṃskṛtā asaṃskṛtā dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ,
S06psp_5u:479_5: tan mā haiva bhagavatā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā vikopitā bhavet?
S06psp_5u:480_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte, nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭā dharmāṇāṃ sūcanakṛtā,
S06psp_5u:480_1: kathaṃ paro 'vatariṣyatiti na dharmāṇān dharmatā vikopitā bhavet.
S06psp_5u:481_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan nāmanimittā hi te dharmā nirdiṣṭāḥ pareṣām avatāraṇāya,
S06psp_5u:481_1: kathaṃ bhagavarm anāmakā animittāḥ sarvadharmā nāma nimittena vyāhṛtāḥ? iti caryāvikopanavikalpaḥ
S06psp_5u:482_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte vyavahāro nāmanimittam abhiniveśo vā nātra subhūte nāmni vyavaharāmi,
S06psp_5u:482_2: na hi subhūte tathāgataśrāvako vā nāmni nimitte vābhiniviśate.
S06psp_5u:482_3: na hi subhūte nāma nāmny abhiniviśate,
S06psp_5u:482_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmamātre sthitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:483_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan nāmamātram idaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtaṃ,
S06psp_5u:483_1: kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavati,
S06psp_5u:483_3: śīlaṃ rakṣati, kṣāntyā saṃpādayati, vīryam ārabhate, dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, prajñāṃ bhāvayati, śūnyatāyāṃ carati, apramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṣu viharati,
S06psp_5u:483_6: 124) samāpadyate, āryasatyāni bhāvayati, vimokṣasamādhisamāpattiṃ dhāraṇīmukhāni samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:484_0: bhagavān āha: yaṃ subhūtir evam āha, yadi nāmamātram idaṃ sarvasaṃskṛtaṃ,
S06psp_5u:484_1: tat kasyedānīṃ kṛtena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye cittam utpādyānekavidhāṃ saṃsāracārikāṃ pratyanubhavatīti,
S06psp_5u:484_3: tac ca nāma nāmnā śūnyaṃ nimittaṃ nimittena śūnyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:484_4: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:484_6: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvāṃs tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvāpayati,
S06psp_5u:484_7: tasya ca nāmanimittasya notpādo na nirodho na sthitir na sthiter anyathātvaṃ prajñāyate.
S06psp_5u:485_0: subhūtir āha: sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñateti bhagavan vadasi.
S06psp_5u:487_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ punar bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā,
S06psp_5u:487_2: sarvajñatāpi tathāgatena nirdiṣṭā? āsāṃ bhagavaṃs tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kiṃ nānākaraṇam?
S06psp_5u:488_0: bhagavān āha: sarvākārajñatā subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya,
S06psp_5u:489_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya?
S06psp_5u:490_0: bhagavān āha: yāvantaḥ subhūte ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittais te dharmāḥ sūcyante,
S06psp_5u:490_1: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tathāgatenānubaddhāni tenocyate tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvākārajñatā.
S06psp_5u:491_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan mārgajñatā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām?
S06psp_5u:492_0: bhagavān āha: sarvamārgāḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notpādayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:492_1: sarvamārgā jñātavyāḥ, yaś ca śrāvakāṇāṃ mārgo, yaś ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ mārgo,
S06psp_5u:492_2: ye ca bodhimārgās te ca mārgāḥ paripūrayitavyāḥ taiś ca mārge mārgakaraṇīyaṃ kartavyan na cānena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06psp_5u:493_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭir na sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:494_0: bhagavān āha: nāparipūrya praṇidhānaṃ nāparipācya sattvān nāpariśodhya buddhakṣetran tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā,
S06psp_5u:495_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvajñatā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānām?
S06psp_5u:496_0: bhagavān āha: etāvad eva subhūte sarvaṃ yāvad evādhyātmikāś ca bāhyāś ca dharmās te ca sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhair jñātā,
S06psp_5u:497_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārge sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:504_0: subhūtir āha: tat katham idānīṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā?
S06psp_5u:505_0: bhagavān āha: tat kiṃ manyase? subhūte api nu tava mārge sthitasyānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimuktam.
S06psp_5u:511_0: bhagavān āha: tava naiva mārge nāmārge sthitasya?
S06psp_5u:512_0: subhūtir āha: na bhagavan, api tu khalu punar me bhagavaṃś cittaṃ vimuktaṃ yathā na kvacit sthitvā syām.
S06psp_5u:513_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na kvacit sthitvā bhūtakoṭiḥ sākṣātkartavyā.
S06psp_5u:514_0: subhūtir āha: yāḥ punar imā bhagavan sarvākārajñatā ca mārgajñatā ca sarvajñatā ca kaccid bhagavann āsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ sarvajñatānāṃ kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
S06psp_5u:515_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte kleśaprahāṇasya nānātvam asti,
S06psp_5u:516_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvajñatāyām anuprāptāyām aśeṣaprahāṇam asaṃskṛtaṃ bhavati?
S06psp_5u:517_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat.
S06psp_5u:518_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann asaṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate?
S06psp_5u:519_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte 'saṃskṛtasya nānātvam upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:520_0: subhūtir āha: yadi nopalabhyate kuta etan nirdiśyate? asya vāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇam,
S06psp_5u:521_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:521_2: abhāvo nirvāṇaṃ, tat kutaḥ punar bhagavan nirdiśyate? ayaṃ srotaāpanno 'yaṃ sakṛdāgāmy ayam anāgāmy ayam arhann ayaṃ pratyekabuddho 'yan tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ.
S06psp_5u:522_0: bhagavān āha: na khalu subhūte asaṃskṛtaṃ bhāvayati api tu lokavyavahāraṃ pramāṇīkṛtyocyate na punaḥ paramārthena śakyā prabhāvanā.
S06psp_5u:522_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi tatrāsti vākpathaprajñāptir,
S06psp_5u:522_2: api tu khalu punar yaiḥ pūrvānto vyavacchinnas teṣāṃ paścimā koṭiprajñāptā.
S06psp_5u:524_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, svalakṣaṇaśūnyānāṃ subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ pūrvā koṭir na prajñāyate,
S06psp_5u:524_2: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ye te sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_5u:524_3: teṣām evaṃ nirdiṣṭam iyaṃ pūrvā koṭir iyaṃ paścimā koṭir,
S06psp_5u:524_4: na punaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu pūrvā koṭir na paścimā koṭir upalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:524_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:524_6: svalakṣaṇaśūnyeṣu dharmeṣu caran na kvacid abhiniviśate 'dhyātmikeṣu vā bāhyeṣu vā saṃskṛteṣu vāsaṃskṛteṣu vā śrāvakadharmeṣu vā pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu vā.
S06psp_5u:525_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:526_0: bhagavān āha: paramapāramitaiṣā subhūte sarvadharmāṇām agamanārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate.
S06psp_5u:526_1: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte etayā prajñāpāramitayā sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvās tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pāraṅgatās tenārthena prajñāpāramitety ucyate.
S06psp_5u:526_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte paramārthena yo 'rthaḥ sarvadharmāṇām abhinnaḥ,
S06psp_5u:526_3: sa iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ,
S06psp_5u:527_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathatāntargatā,
S06psp_5u:527_1: bhūtakoṭir antargatā, dharmadhātur antargataḥ tenocyate prajñāpāramiteti.
S06psp_5u:527_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte neyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kenacid dharmeṇa saṃyuktā vā visaṃyuktā vā sanidarśanā vānidarśanā vā sapratighā vāpratighā vā.
S06psp_5u:527_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hīyaṃ prajñāpāramitārūpānidarśanāpratighaikalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇatvāt.
S06psp_5u:528_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ cārikā sarvapratibhānānāṃ sarvālokānām anācchedyeyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhir devatābhiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddha (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:528_1: 128) yānikair vā pudgalair, yāvan na kenacid anyatīrthikaiḥ pratyamitrair vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śakyā cchettuṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya.
S06psp_5u:528_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te 'tra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nopalabhyante sarva evaivaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:529_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam anityārthe caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:529_1: duḥkhārthe caritavyam, anātmārthe caritavyaṃ, śāntārthe caritavyaṃ, duḥkhajñānārthe caritavyaṃ, samudayajñānārthe caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:529_2: nirodhajñānārthe caritavyaṃ, mārgajñatārthe caritavyaṃ, duḥkhaparijñatārthe samudayaprahāṇārthe nirodhasākṣātkriyārthe mārgajñatārthe anvayajñānārthe caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:529_4: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:530_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:530_1: yadi bhagavann iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthaś cānarthaś ca nopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:530_2: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattveneha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām arthe caritavyam?
S06psp_5u:531_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena gambhīre 'rthe prajñāpāramitārthe carataivaṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:531_6: idaṃ dṛṣṭigato me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:531_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi rāgadveṣamohānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:531_8: na dṛṣṭigatānāṃ tathatā kasyacid artham anarthaṃ karoti.
S06psp_5u:531_10: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:531_11: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni me 'rtho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:531_16: bodhipakṣyā me dharmā artho 'nartha iti na caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:531_22: anuttarā me samyaksaṃbodhir artho 'nartha iti na caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:531_23: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte tathāgatenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya na kaścid dharma upalabdho yo 'rthaṃ vā kuryād anarthaṃ vā kuryād,
S06psp_5u:531_24: api nu khalu punaḥ subhūte utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmadhātur dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmatā sā naiva kasyacid arthaṃ vā karoty anarthaṃ vā,
S06psp_5u:531_25: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenārthānartho varjayitvā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:532_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:532_1: kena kāraṇena bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nānarthakarī nārthakarī?
S06psp_5u:533_0: bhagavān āha: tathā hi subhūte saṃskṛtadharmāṇām asaṃskṛtadharmāṇām akāraṇaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06psp_5u:533_1: tena kāraṇena prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid arthaṃ vā karoty anarthaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:534_0: subhūtir āha: punar bhagavann asaṃskṛto 'rthaḥ sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:535_0: bhagavān āha: asaṃskṛto 'rthaḥ sarvāryāṇāṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca,
S06psp_5u:535_1: pratyupasthito na punar apakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā,
S06psp_5u:535_2: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ākāśasya tathatā na kasyacid apakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:535_3: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā na kasyacid dharmasyāpakāreṇa vopakāreṇa vā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_5u:536_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati?
S06psp_5u:537_0: bhagavān āha: iha punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saṃskṛtāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:538_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann advayadharmo 'dvayadharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:539_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan dvayadharmo 'dvayadharmam anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:541_0: subhūtir āha: katham idānīṃ bhagavann anuprāpyate?
S06psp_5u:542_0: bhagavān āha: yathā nādvayo na dvayo dharma upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:543_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan nādvayo na dvayo dharma upalabhyate?
S06psp_5u:544_0: bhagavān āha: anupalambhaṃ prati na rūpam anupalambhena prāpnoti,
S06psp_5u:544_1: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān,
S06psp_5u:545_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:545_1: gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duṣkarakārakā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthitā na ca nāmasattva upalabhyate na sattvaprajñāptis,
S06psp_5u:545_2: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum abhisaṃprasthitāḥ.
S06psp_5u:545_3: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścid eva puruṣa ākāśe apratiṣṭhāne stambam icched dhāpayitum,
S06psp_5u:545_4: evam eva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtenecchet sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_5u:546_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sarvākārajñatārtham abhipratiṣṭhante,
S06psp_5u:546_1: tāñ ca sarvākārajñatām anubudhya sarvasattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyanti.
S06psp_5u:547_0: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣaḥ stambam icched vāpanāya sa ca puruṣas tasya stambasya na mūlaṃ jānīyād na śākhāṃ na tvacchedaṃ na pattraṃ na palāśaṃ na puṣpaṃ jānīyāt,
S06psp_5u:547_1: sa tasya stambasya kāṇḍaṃ vāpayeta vāpayitvā kālena kālaṃ gopāyatodakaṃ dadyād arthaṃ tasya tat kāṇḍam anupūrveṇa śākhāsaṃpannañ ca bhavet,
S06psp_5u:547_2: pattrasaṃpannañ ca bhavet, puṣpasaṃpannañ ca bhavet, phalasaṃpannañ ca bhavet, sa tasya stambasya pattrāṇy anubhuñjīt,
S06psp_5u:547_4: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃboddhum abhisaṃprasthitā anupūrveṇa ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carantaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyanti,
S06psp_5u:547_6: tatredaṃ subhūte pattraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yad āgamya sattvās tribhyo 'pāyebhyaḥ parimucyante.
S06psp_5u:547_7: tatredaṃ puṣpaṃ yad āgamya kṣatriyamahāśālakuleṣu brāhmaṇamahāśālakuleṣu gṛhapatimahāśālakuleṣu (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:547_8: 131) vā cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyante trayastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratisu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu brahmapārṣadyeṣu yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyataneṣu upapadyante.
S06psp_5u:547_9: tatredaṃ phalaṃ yad āgamya sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhante,
S06psp_5u:547_11: 'nāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhante, arhattve pratiṣṭhante, pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhante, tad eva ca phalam āgamya sattvāḥ sarvākārajñatam anuprāpnuvanti,
S06psp_5u:547_13: tatra ye dakṣiṇāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti te sarve 'nupūrveṇa tribhir yānaiḥ parinirvānti,
S06psp_5u:547_14: yad uta śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā mahāyānena vā,
S06psp_5u:547_17: na ca sattvaprajñāptis te ca sattvā ātmagrāhataḥ parimocyante.
S06psp_5u:547_18: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:547_19: na ceha kaścit sattvo vā sattvaprajñāptir vopalabhyate,
S06psp_5u:547_20: yeṣāṃ sattvānām ahaṃkṛte na sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyāmīti.
S06psp_5u:548_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:548_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvam āgamya sarvanarakā ucchidyante,
S06psp_5u:548_5: sarvahīnagataya ucchidyante, sarvakāmadhātur ucchidyante, sarvo rūpadhātur ucchidyante,
S06psp_5u:549_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathāgata evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:549_1: sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye nābhipratiṣṭhet,
S06psp_5u:549_2: nātītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhā nābhisaṃbhotsyante nābhisaṃbudhyante.
S06psp_5u:549_8: na sarvanarakā ucchetsyante, na sarvatiryagyonayo na sarvayamalokā ucchetsyanti,
S06psp_5u:549_10: na sarvahīnagatayo na kāmadhātur na rūpadhātur nārūpyadhātur ucchetsyati.
S06psp_5u:549_11: api tu khalu punar bhagavan yāvat tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:550_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, tathāgata eva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ.
S06psp_5u:550_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? yayaiva hi subhūte tathatayā tathāgataḥ prajñapyate,
S06psp_5u:550_4: tayaiva tathatayā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ prajñapyante,
S06psp_5u:550_6: tayaiva tathatayā skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca prajñapyante,
S06psp_5u:550_7: evaṃ yāvat tayaiva tathatayā saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛtaś ca dhātuḥ prajñapyate,
S06psp_5u:550_8: tayaiva tathatayā sarvasattvatathatā tathāgatatathatā ca prajñapyate,
S06psp_5u:550_9: tathāgatatathatāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:550_11: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvas tathāgata eva veditavyaḥ tathatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya.
