S06psp_5u:550_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānām indriyakuśalo bhaviṣyatīndriyaparāparakauśalyam anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:550_15: praṇidhijñānaṃ paripūrya triṣv andhasu jñānaṃ viśodhayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:550_16: triṣv andhasu jñānaṃ viśodhya bodhisattvacaryā caran sattvānām arthaṃ kariṣyati,
S06psp_5u:550_20: dharmacakraṃ pravartya sattvās triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyati,
S06psp_5u:550_21: sattvāṃs triṣu yāneṣu pratiṣṭhāpyānupadhiśese nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyati.
S06psp_5u:550_22: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaguṇānuśaṃsā saṃpaśyamānenātmanaś ca parasya cānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam utpādayitavyam.
S06psp_5u:551_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:551_1: namaskaraṇīyā bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti.
S06psp_5u:552_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, yathā vadasi, namaskaraṇīyās te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ caranti.
S06psp_5u:553_0: subhūtir āha: kiyat sa bhagavan prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06psp_5u:554_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:554_1: yāvantaḥ subhūte sāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān sarvān kvacid eva śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā pratiṣṭhāpayed,
S06psp_5u:554_2: api nu sa sattvo bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet?
S06psp_5u:555_0: subhūtir āha: bahu bhagavan bahu sugata, aprameyaṃ bhagavann aprameyaṃ sugata.
S06psp_5u:555_1: bhagavān āha: yac ca khalu subhūte sāhasre lokadhātau śrāvakayānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā puṇyakriyāvastu,
S06psp_5u:555_3: tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_4: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatataraīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api kotīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti.
S06psp_5u:555_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikā,
S06psp_5u:555_7: evaṃ yāvat trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śrāvakayānikānāṃ sattvānāṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ vā puṇyakriyāvastu,
S06psp_5u:555_9: tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_11: tat kasya hetoḥ? bodhisattvaprasūtā hi śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikā,
S06psp_5u:555_14: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramāhāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve śuklavidarśanābhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_17: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve gotrabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti yāvat koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalān nopaiti.
S06psp_5u:555_19: 134) pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ, sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsahasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve 'ṣṭamakabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya puṇyaskandhasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_22: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve darśanabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_25: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve tanubhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_28: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve vītarāgabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_30: tiṣṭhantu vītarāgabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve kṛtāvibhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_33: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve pratyekabuddhabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat prathamacittotpādikasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_36: sacet subhūte ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve bodhisattvaniyāmāvakrāntau pratiṣṭhāpitā bhaveyus teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tad bodhisattvapratipannakasya puṇyasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:555_39: sacet subhūte ye (PSP_5:135) trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarve bodhisattvapratipannakā bhaveyus,
S06psp_5u:555_40: teṣāṃ yat puṇyaṃ tat tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śatatamīm api kalān nopaiti,
S06psp_5u:556_0: subhūtir āha: prathamacittotpādikena bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kiṃ manasikartavyam?
S06psp_5u:557_0: bhagavān āha: prathamacittotpādikena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatā manasikartavyā.
S06psp_5u:558_0: subhūtir āha: sarvākārajñatā kiṃ bhagavann abhāvasvabhāvā? sarvākārajñatāyāś ca bhagavan kim ārambaṇam? kim ādhipateyaṃ? kim ākāraṃ? kiṃ lakṣaṇam?
S06psp_5u:559_1: yat punaḥ subhūtir evam āha, sarvākārajñatāyāḥ kim ārambaṇaṃ,
S06psp_5u:559_2: kim ādhipateyaṃ, kim ākāraṃ, kiṃ lakṣaṇam iti. sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte abhāva ārambaṇaṃ,
S06psp_5u:559_3: smṛtir adhipatiḥ, śānta ākāro, 'lakṣaṇaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ, sarvākārajñatāyāḥ subhūte idam ārambaṇam ayam adhipatir ayam ākāra idaṃ lakṣaṇam.
S06psp_5u:560_0: kiṃ punar bhagavan sarvākārajñataivābhāvaḥ? utāho rūpam apy abhāvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:560_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam apy abhāvaḥ? skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni vābhāvaḥ? evam adhyātmikā vā bāhyā dharmā abhāvaḥ? catvāri dhyānāni catvāry apramāṇāni catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni,
S06psp_5u:560_3: animittasamādhiḥ, apraṇihitasamādhiḥ, aṣṭavimokṣā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ mahāmaitrī mahākaruṇā mahāmuditā mahopekṣā prathamā abhijñā dvitīyā abhijñā tṛtīyā abhijñā caturthy abhijñā pañcamy abhijñā ṣaṣṭhy abhijñā saṃskṛto dhātur asaṃskṛto dhātur abhāvaḥ?
S06psp_5u:561_4: evam adhyātmikā bāhyāś ca dharmāḥ smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgalmārgā apramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāryasatyābhijñāḥ sarvapāramitāḥ,
S06psp_5u:561_5: sarvaśūnyatā daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvida āveṇikabuddhadharmā api subhūte abhāvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:561_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte tasyāḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti,
S06psp_5u:561_9: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:562_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo nāsti?
S06psp_5u:563_0: bhagavān āha: nāsti subhūte sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
S06psp_5u:563_1: yasya subhūte sāṃyogikaḥ svabhāvo nāsti so 'bhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:564_0: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte tathatāvitathatānanyatathatābhūtakoṭisvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ,
S06psp_5u:564_2: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam abhāvasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmāḥ.
S06psp_5u:565_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:565_2: katamenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ prathamacittotpādiko bodhisattvo mahhāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:565_5: kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati, vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati, dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, prathame dhyāne carati, dvitīye dhyāne carati, tṛtīye dhyāne carati, caturthe dhyāne carati, maitryāṃ karuṇāyāṃ muditāyām upekṣāyām ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattau vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattāv ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattau naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattau caraty,
S06psp_5u:565_6: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatāyām adhyātmabahirdhāśūunyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:565_9: 137) aṣṭasu vimokṣeṣu navānupūrvavihārasamāpattiṣu dhāraṇīmukheṣu daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:566_0: bhagavān āha: etad eva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ veditavyaṃ yad abhāvasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:566_2: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati, tac ca buddhakṣetraṃ tāṃś ca sattvān abhāvasvabhāvān jānāti.
S06psp_5u:566_3: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:566_4: śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:566_5: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoty,
S06psp_5u:566_6: āryasatyeṣu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhau caran maitrīkaraṇāmuditopekṣāsu caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:566_9: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran bodhimārge parijayaṃ kurvan,
S06psp_5u:566_11: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair mahāmaitryā mahākaruṇayā sarvākārajñatājñānena ca samanvāgato bhavati,
S06psp_5u:566_12: ime subhūte bodhaye mārgāḥ, sa ebhir bodhimārgaiḥ pāramitāḥ paripūrayati,
S06psp_5u:566_13: pāramitāḥ paripūrya sarvan tad ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati,
S06psp_5u:567_0: sa buddhacakṣuṣā trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ vyavalokya bhāvam api nopalabhate prāg evābhāvam.
S06psp_5u:567_1: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam abhāvasvabhāvaiḥ sarvadharmair idaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:567_2: yad bhāva iti nopalabhyate prāg evābhāva iti.
S06psp_5u:567_3: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran dānaṃ dadāti,
S06psp_5u:567_4: sa tad dānam abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:567_6: tam api bodhisattvam (PSP_5:138) abhāva iti saṃjanīte. evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran,
S06psp_5u:567_7: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃs tām api prajñāpāramitām abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:567_8: yeṣāṃ prajñā bhāvyate tān apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:567_9: yo 'pi bhāvayati tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte.
S06psp_5u:567_13: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caraṃs tām apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:567_14: yo 'py abhisaṃbudhyate tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:567_15: yenāpy abhisaṃbudhyate tam apy abhāva iti saṃjānīte.
S06psp_5u:567_16: tat kasya hetoḥ? yathaiva hīyam abhāvasvabhāvā tathaiva sarvadhrmā abhāvasvabhāvās,
S06psp_5u:567_17: te ca buddhair akṛtāḥ śrāvakair akārakāḥ,
S06psp_5u:568_0: subhūtir āha: nanu bhagavan dharmair eva dharmā virahitāḥ?
S06psp_5u:569_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, dharmair eva subhūte dharmā virahitāḥ.
S06psp_5u:570_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan dharmair eva dharmā virahitāḥ,
S06psp_5u:570_1: kathaṃ bhagavan virahito dharmo virahitaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte bhāvaṃ vā abhāvaṃ vā? na hi bhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:570_2: na hy abhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:570_3: na hi bhāvo dharmo 'bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06psp_5u:570_4: na hy abhāvo dharmo bhāvaṃ dharmaṃ saṃjānīte.
S06psp_5u:570_5: evam asaṃjānāneṣu dharmeṣu kuta evaṃ bhavati? bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā lokasaṃvṛtim upādāya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā nirdiśati,
S06psp_5u:571_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavann anyā lokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ?
S06psp_5u:571_1: bhagavān āha: na subhūte 'nyā lokasaṃvṛtir anyaḥ paramārthaḥ,
S06psp_5u:571_2: yaiva lokasaṃvṛtes tathatā saiva paramārthasya tathatā,
S06psp_5u:571_3: tān te sattvā evaṃtathatān na jānanti na paśyanti,
S06psp_5u:571_4: teṣām arthāya lokasaṃvṛtyā nirdiśyate bhāva iti vābhāva iti vā.
S06psp_5u:571_5: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte ya ete sattvāḥ pañcabhiḥ skandhair bhāvasaṃjñino abhāva iti na jānanti,
S06psp_5u:571_7: teṣām arthāyaivaṃ nirdiśyate dharmāṇāṃ prabhedatām upādāya katham api bhāvam abhāvaṃ vā jñāsyanti.
S06psp_5u:571_8: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:572_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:572_1: bodhisattvacaryā bodhisattvacaryeti bhagavann ucyate kasyaitad adhivacanam?
S06psp_5u:573_0: bhagavān āha: bodhisattvacaryeti subhūte bodhaye caryaiṣā bodhicārikā tasmād bodhisattvacaryety ucyate.
S06psp_5u:574_0: subhūtir āha: kva sā bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsavasya bodhisattvacaryā?
S06psp_5u:575_0: bhagavān āha: rūpaṃ śūnyam iti carati, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ śūnyam iti carati, evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanāni śūnyānīti carati,
S06psp_5u:575_3: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati, kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati, vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati, dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, bahirdhāsūnyatāyāṃ carati, adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:575_5: prathame dhyāne carati, dvitīye dhyāne carati, tṛtīye dhyāne carati, caturthe dhyāne carati, maitrīkaruṇāmuditopekṣāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:575_9: caturṣv ṛddhipādeṣu carati, pañcasv indriyeṣu carati, pañcasu baleṣu carati, saptasu bodhyaṅgeṣu carati, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgeṣu carati, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitasamādhau caraty,
S06psp_5u:575_11: caturṣv āryasatyeṣu carati, daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu carati,
S06psp_5u:575_12: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu carati, catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsu carati,
S06psp_5u:575_14: pañcasv abhijñāsu carati, sarvasamādhiṣu carati, sarvadhāraṇīmukheṣu carati, buddhakṣetraṃ pariśodhanāya carati,
S06psp_5u:575_15: sattvaparipācanāya carati, pratibhāneṣu carati, akṣarābhinirhāraḥ śūnya iti carati,
S06psp_5u:575_18: śūkṣmapraveśeṣu carati, dhāraṇyāṃ carati, saṃskṛtadhātau carati, asaṃskṛtadhātau (PSP_5:140) carati, evam atra carati yathā bodhim advayī karoti na dvaidhī karoti.
S06psp_5u:575_19: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhaye carati.
S06psp_5u:576_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:577_0: bhagavān āha: bhūtārtho buddha ity ucyate. api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bhūtā asya dharmā abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate,
S06psp_5u:577_1: bhūto 'syārthaḥ pratividdhas tasmād buddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_5u:577_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvadharmā yathāvadabhisaṃbuddhās tasmād buddha ity ucyate.
S06psp_5u:578_0: subhūtir āha: bodhir iti bhagavan kasyaitad adhivacanam?
S06psp_5u:579_0: bhagavān āha: bodhir iti subhūte śūnyatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ,
S06psp_5u:579_1: tathatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ, dharmatāyā etad adhivacanaṃ, bhūtakoṭer etad adhivacanaṃ, dharmadhātor etad adhivacanam.
S06psp_5u:579_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmadheyamātram etad bodhir iti.
S06psp_5u:579_3: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte abhedārtho bodhyarthaḥ.
S06psp_5u:579_4: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhis tathatāvitathatānanyatathatānanyathībhāvas tasmād bodhir ity ucyate.
S06psp_5u:579_5: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte nāmanimittamātram etad bodhir iti tasmād bodhir ucyate.
S06psp_5u:579_6: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhānām eva bhagavatām eṣā bodhis tasmād bodhir ity ucyate.
S06psp_5u:579_7: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte buddhair eṣā bhagavadbhir abhisaṃbuddhās tasmād bodhir ity ucyate.
S06psp_5u:580_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:580_1: yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
S06psp_5u:580_7: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati, kasya dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā?
S06psp_5u:581_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:581_1: yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imā yair bodhaye carati,
S06psp_5u:581_6: na sarvākārajñatāyāṃ carati, na kasyacid dharmasyāgame vā caraty apagame vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vyavadānāya vā.
S06psp_5u:581_7: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carata ārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā ācaye vā apacaye vā hānau vā vṛddhau vā utpādāya vā nirodhāya vā saṃkleśāya vā vyavadānāya vā pratyupasthitā.
S06psp_5u:582_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahyāsattvasya bodhir na kasyacid dharmasyārambaṇayogena pratyupasthitā,
S06psp_5u:582_1: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran dānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06psp_5u:582_2: śīlapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti, kṣāntipāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti, vīryapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti, dhyānapāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti, prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti, adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ carati, yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:583_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:583_1: na hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dvayena bodhisattvacarir,
S06psp_5u:583_2: na hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvayena dānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:583_3: śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati, kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati, vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati, dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati, na dvayena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:584_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavan dānapāramitāyāṃ na dvayena caraty,
S06psp_5u:584_1: evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na dvayena carati,
S06psp_5u:584_3: 142) na dvayena carati, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābbhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu na dvayena carati,
S06psp_5u:584_5: tat katham idānīṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate prathamacittotpādam upādāya yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair vivardhate?
S06psp_5u:585_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:585_1: ye subhūte dvayena caranti na te vivardhante kuśalamūlair dharmaiḥ.
S06psp_5u:585_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? dvaye niśritya hi subhūte sarvabālapṛthagjanās te na vivardhate kuśalamūlair dharmair,
S06psp_5u:585_3: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar advayena carati tena prathamacittotpādam upādāya kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:585_4: yāvat paścimakaś cittotpādaḥ kuśalamūlair dharmair vivardhate.
S06psp_5u:585_6: yair akuśalair dharmair avamarditaḥ samānaḥ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vāpated ity ebhiś cānyaiś cākuśalair dharmaiḥ saṃhriyamāṇo dānapāramitāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:585_8: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:585_10: adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate,
S06psp_5u:585_13: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ caran na kuśalair dharmair vivardhate.
S06psp_5u:585_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:585_15: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati?
S06psp_5u:586_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kuśalamūlānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:586_3: nāparipūrya kuśalamūlāni, kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum.
S06psp_5u:587_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan paryupāsya buddhān bhagavataḥ kuśalamulāni (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:587_1: 143) paripūrya kalyāṇamitraparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:588_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān paryupāste,
S06psp_5u:588_1: yaṃ ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ bhāṣante sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam itivṛttakaṃ jātakaṃ saṃgrahavaipulyādbhutadharmāvadānopadeśāṃs tān sarvān udgṛhṇāty udgṛhya kāyena vācā suparijitān kṛtvā manasā tatprekṣitān karoti,
S06psp_5u:588_3: dhāraṇīṃ pratilabhate, dhāraṇyāṃ pratilabdhāyāṃ pratisaṃvid utpādayati,
S06psp_5u:588_4: pratisaṃvidbhir utpāditābhis tasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi te dharmā na jātu vipraṇasyanti yāvat sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti,
S06psp_5u:588_5: tatra tais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ kuṣalamūlāny avaropayati,
S06psp_5u:588_6: taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhīto na jātv apāyair vākṣaṇair votpadyate,
S06psp_5u:588_9: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati, taiś ca kuśalamūlaiḥ parigṛhītaḥ kalyāṇamitraiś ca na jātu virahito bhavati buddhair bhagavadbhir bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca ye buddhayānasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante,
S06psp_5u:588_10: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:589_0: atha khalv āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:589_1: yaḥ punar bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpi buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāste,
S06psp_5u:589_4: mā haiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt.
S06psp_5u:590_0: bhagavān āha: na khalu subhūte buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsyānavaropitakuśalamūlaḥ kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt.
S06psp_5u:590_1: tat kasya hetoḥ? buddhān eva tāvad bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny avaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā bhajitvā paryupāsyaivaṃ kuśalamūlasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāptum asamarthaḥ prāg eva buddhān bhagavato 'paryupāsya kuśalamūlāny anavaropya kalyāṇamitrair aparigṛhītaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate,
S06psp_5u:590_4: kuśalamulāni cāvaropitavyāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni.
S06psp_5u:591_0: subhūtir āha: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo buddhāṃś ca bhagavataḥ paryupāsya kuśalamūlāni cāvaropya kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca sevitvā bhaktvā paryupāsya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyāt?
S06psp_5u:592_0: bhagavān āha: upāyakauśalyavirahitatvāt, ye nopāyena śruto bhavati teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām antikāt sadharmas tāni ca kuśalamūlāni nāvaropitāni tāni ca kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitāni bhaktitāni paryupāsitāni yāny asyopāyam upadiśanti tena virahitatvāt.
S06psp_5u:593_1: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:594_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:594_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya dānapāramitāyāṃ caran sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dānaṃ dadāti buddhebhyo bhagavadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyo vā,
S06psp_5u:594_2: sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ samanvāgato na cāsya dānasaṃjñā bhavati,
S06psp_5u:594_3: na pratigrāhakasaṃjñā, na dānapatisaṃjñā. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:594_4: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:594_11: na ca dānaphalam upajīvati yad dānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:595_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikāraiḥ śīlaṃ rakṣati,
S06psp_5u:595_1: tasya naiva rāge cittaṃ patati na doṣe na mohe nānuśaye na paryutthāne patati,
S06psp_5u:595_3: ye bodhaye paripanthakās tadyathā mātsaryacittaṃ vā dauḥśīlyacittaṃ vā kṣubdhacittaṃ vā kauśīdyacittaṃ vā hīnacittaṃ vā bhrāntacittaṃ (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:595_4: 145) vā dauṣprajñacittaṃ vā mānātimāno 'dhimāno 'smimānaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhacittaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:595_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:595_6: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:595_11: sa śīlapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:595_13: na ca śīlaphalam upajīvati yac chīlaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā śīlapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:596_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārais tāṃ kṣāntiṃ bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:596_1: sa svakeṣv api prāṇeṣu vyavaropyamāneṣu na pratidahyate,
S06psp_5u:596_3: sa jīvitād vyaparopyamāno 'pi sarvasve vāpahriyamāṇe dāre vākṛṣyamāṇe mṛṣāvāda ucyamānaḥ piśunaṃ paruṣaṃ saṃbhinnaṃ vocyamāna ākruṣyamāṇo vā tāḍyamāno vā cchidyamāno vā na kṣubhyati sattvānām eva hitam utpādayati.
S06psp_5u:596_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:596_5: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:596_8: so 'nenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ kuśalair dharmair vivardhate sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:596_9: sa kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ caran sarvasattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:596_11: na ca kṣāntiphalam upajīvati yat kṣāntiphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:597_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair vīryam ārabhate,
S06psp_5u:597_1: dṛḍhasaṃnāho dṛḍhaparākramo na kauśīdyaṃ vā alasacittaṃ votpādayati,
S06psp_5u:597_2: sa bodher arthāya duḥkham api na gaṇapatidakṣo 'nalaso 'pi śaktibhir vāryamāṇo manuṣyaduṣkham asuraduḥkhaṃ tiryagyoniduḥkhaṃ narakaduṣkham api na gaṇapatir api śaktibhir vāryamāṇaḥ.
S06psp_5u:597_3: tat (PSP_5:146) kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:597_4: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:597_8: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno vīryapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:597_10: na ca vīryaphalam upajīvati yad vīryaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā vīryapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:598_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:598_1: cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī bhavati,
S06psp_5u:598_2: yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ cakṣurindriyeṇāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
S06psp_5u:598_3: teṣāṃ saṃvarāya pratipadyate rakṣati cakṣurindriyam evaṃ śrotreṇa śabdān śrutvā,
S06psp_5u:598_4: ghrāṇena gandhān āghrāya, jihvayā rasān āsvādya, kāyena spraṣṭavyaṃ spṛṣṭvā, manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati,
S06psp_5u:598_5: nānuvyañjanagrāhī bhavati, yathāvikaraṇam evaṃ manaindriyenāsaṃvarasaṃvṛtaṃ viharantam abhidhyā daurmanasyāḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anuśraveyuḥ,
S06psp_5u:598_7: rakṣati manaindriyaṃ, sa gacchann api tiṣṭhann api niṣaṇṇo 'pi śayāno 'pi bhāṣamāno 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi samāhitāvasthāṃ na jahāti na vijahāti,
S06psp_5u:598_9: śāntakāyaḥ śāntavāk śāntacitto rahasyarahasi vāvikalpiteryāpatho yaiḥ kecid apy annapānaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ surabhaḥ supoṣyaḥ kalyāṇācāragocaraḥ saṃgaṇikāyā api vivekagocaraḥ lābhe 'lābhe ca sa nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ sukhe duṣkhe stutau nindāyāṃ yaśasyayaśasi jīvite ca maraṇe ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ,
S06psp_5u:598_10: śatrau ca mitre ca sādhau cāsādhau ca manaāpavartiny amanaāpavartiny āryeṣu śabdesv anāryeṣu (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:598_11: 147) śabdeṣu vivikteṣu vyavakīrṇeṣu ca samo nirvikāro 'nunnatāvanataḥ priyāpriyeṣu rūpeṣv anurodhavirodhāpagaḥ.
S06psp_5u:598_12: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:598_13: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:598_17: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06psp_5u:598_18: sa dhyānapāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:598_20: na dhyānaphalam upajīvati yad dhyānaphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā dhyānapāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:599_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na duṣprajño bhavati na parapraṇeyo 'haṃkāramamakāravigataḥ,
S06psp_5u:599_1: ātmasattva jīvajantu poṣapuruṣa pudgalamanujamānavakārakavedakajānakapaśyakavigataś ca bhavati sarvadṛṣṭivigataḥ sarvaśūnyatāvigato nirvikalpo nirvikāraḥ.
S06psp_5u:599_2: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:599_3: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:599_8: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sattvāṃś ca paripācayati,
S06psp_5u:599_10: na ca prajñāphalam upajīvati yat prajñāphalaṃ saṃsāre paribhuñjītānyatra sattvaparitrāṇatayā sattvaparimocanatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati.
S06psp_5u:600_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:600_2: tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate, caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:600_4: prathamacittotpādam upādāya sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair na ca teṣāṃ vipākaṃ parigṛhṇāti.
S06psp_5u:600_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bhavati,
S06psp_5u:600_6: yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgatas tāni ca dhyānāny apramāṇārūpyasamāpattīḥ samāpadyamānaḥ sa (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:600_8: asadbhutān apariniṣpannan anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:600_12: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno dhyānāpramāṇārūpyasamāpattīś ca samāpadyate.
S06psp_5u:601_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran darśanabhāvanāprahātavye 'smin mārge carati,
S06psp_5u:601_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān sarvadharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:601_4: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:601_8: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamānaḥ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06psp_5u:601_9: bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:602_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann aṣṭavimokṣān samāpadyate,
S06psp_5u:602_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:602_6: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:602_11: sa vimokṣasamādhisamāpattyāryasatyaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu caran śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim avakrāmatīyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānutpattikadharmavyākaraṇakṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:603_0: punar aparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran daśasu tathāgatabaleṣu parijayaṃ karoti,
S06psp_5u:603_1: caturṣu vaiśāradyeṣu (PSP_5:149) catasṛṣu pratisaṃvitsv aṣṭādaśasv āveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ ca,
S06psp_5u:603_5: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa svalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyān dharmān jānāti,
S06psp_5u:603_6: asadbhūtān apariniṣpannān anabhinirvṛttāṃś ca sarvadharmān paśyati,
S06psp_5u:603_8: akiṃcitsamarthatāṃ ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ saṃskāraṃ lakṣaṇam avatarati,
S06psp_5u:603_10: sa kuśalair dharmair vivardhamāno daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmeṣu mahāmaitryāṃ mahākaruṇāyāṃ caran buddhakṣetraṃ ca pariśodhayati,
S06psp_5u:603_11: sattvāṃś ca paripācayati. evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:604_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:605_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:605_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat, paramabuddhimantaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ya evaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu caranti,
S06psp_5u:605_2: vipākaṃ ca na pratigṛhṇanti. tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ svabhāvato na calanti.
S06psp_5u:606_0: subhūtir āha: kasmāt svabhāvān na calanti?
S06psp_5u:607_0: bhagavān āha: abhāvato na calanti, yat punar āyuṣmān subūtir evam āha katamasmāt svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:607_2: na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_5u:607_7: śīlapāramitāyāḥ kṣāntipāramitāyā vīryapāramitāyā dhyānapāramitāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:607_8: adhyātmaśūnyatāyā bahirdhāśūnyatāyā adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāyā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāḥ svabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:607_9: apramāṇasvabhāvād dhyānārūpyasamāpattisvabhāvāt smṛtyupasthānasvabhāvāt samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgasvabhāvād āryāṣṭāṅgamārgasvabhāvān na calanti,
S06psp_5u:607_14: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte ya eṣa dharmo niḥsvabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:608_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:608_1: tat kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:610_0: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ punar bhagavan bhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:612_0: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ bhagavann abhāvena bhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:614_0: subhūtir āha: tat kiṃ bhagavan bhāvenābhāvaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum?
S06psp_5u:616_0: subhūtir āha: tan mā haiva bhagavan na prāptir nābhisamayo bhaviṣyati? yadi nābhāvenābhāvasyābhisamayo,
S06psp_5u:617_0: bhagavān āha: asyābhisamayo na punar anena catuḥprakārābhinihāreṇa.
S06psp_5u:618_0: subhūtir āha: katham idānīṃ bhagavann abhisamayaḥ?
S06psp_5u:619_0: bhagavān āha: naivābhāvo na bhāvaḥ, sa tādṛśo 'bhisamayo yatraite prapañcā na saṃvidyante,
S06psp_5u:620_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:620_1: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ?
S06psp_5u:621_0: bhagavān āha: rūpan nityam anityam iti vā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_1: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ nityam anityam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_2: rūpaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham iti vā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkham iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_3: rūpam ātmānātmeti, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānam ātmānātmeti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_4: rūpaṃ śāntam aśāntam iti vā, vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ śāntam aśāntam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_5: rūpaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_6: vedanā saṃjñā (PSP_5:151) saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vā prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_16: catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni bhāvayitavyānīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_20: srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvam atikramiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_29: adhyātmaśūnyatāṃ bahirdhāśūnyatām adhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāṃ yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāṃ bhāvayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_30: catvāri vaiśāradyāni daśatathāgatabalāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān utpādayiṣyāmīti prapañcaḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_33: tasmād bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ nityam anityam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:621_34: sukhaṃ duḥkham iti, ātmānātmeti, śāntam aśāntam iti, parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:621_35: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ nityam anityam aprapañcan na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:621_36: sukhaṃ duḥkham ity, ātmānātmeti, śāntam aśāntam iti, parijñeyam aparijñeyam ity aprapañcan na prapañcayati.
S06psp_5u:621_37: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādān pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni ca nityam anityam iti,
S06psp_5u:621_38: sukhaṃ duḥkham (PSP_5:152) iti, ātmānatmeti, śāntam aśāntam iti, parijñeyam aparijñeyam iti vāprapañcan na prapañcayati.
S06psp_5u:621_39: evaṃ sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā bodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatānitmittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmān sarvān aprapañcān na prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:621_42: tat kasya hetoḥ? na hi svabhāvaḥ svabhāvaṃ prapañcayati,
S06psp_5u:621_44: na hi svabhāvo 'bhāvaṃ vā sthāpayitvā anyat kiñcid upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:621_45: yaṃ vā prapañcayet, yatra vā prapañcayet, yena vā prapañcayet. tasmāt tarhi subhūte niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:621_46: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, niṣprapañcaṃ vijñānaṃ, niṣprapañcāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_48: sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ sarvabodhipakṣyā dharmāḥ sarvasamādhayaḥ sarvadhāraṇīmukhāny āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattayo 'ṣṭavimokṣānavānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo niṣprapañcāḥ,
S06psp_5u:621_53: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena niṣprapañcena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:622_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ yāvad vijñānaṃ niḥprapañcaṃ peyālaṃ yāvad bodhir niṣprapañcā?
S06psp_5u:623_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:623_2: nāsti vedanāyā nāsti saṃjñāyā nāsti saṃskārāṇāṃ nāsti vijñānasya svabhāvo,
S06psp_5u:623_3: nāsti skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasya pratītyasamutpādāṅgānāṃ svabhāvo nāsti pāramitānāṃ svabhāvo nāsti śūnyatāmukhānāṃ svabhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:623_4: evaṃ nāsti bodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo nāsti sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvo,
S06psp_5u:623_5: yasya svabhāvaṃ nāsti so 'prapañco 'nena subhūte kāraṇena niṣprapañcaṃ rūpaṃ,
S06psp_5u:623_6: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, niṣprapañcaṃ vijñānaṃ, niṣprapañcāḥ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ,
S06psp_5u:623_8: sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā bodhipakṣyā dharmā niṣprapañcāḥ,
S06psp_5u:623_12: sarvākārajñatā niṣprapañcā. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhi sattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati.
S06psp_5u:624_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:624_1: yadi bhagavan na kasyacid dharmasya svabhāva upalabhate,
S06psp_5u:624_2: tat katamena mārgeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati? kiṃ śrāvakamārgeṇa vā pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā buddhamārgeṇa vā?
S06psp_5u:625_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:625_1: na subhūte śrāvakamārgeṇa vā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati na pratyekabuddhamārgeṇa vā na buddhamārgeṇa vā.
S06psp_5u:625_2: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:625_3: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan sarvamārgeṣu śikṣitvā samyaktvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:625_4: na ca tāvat phalaṃ prāpnoti, yāvan na phalamārgam utpādayati.
S06psp_5u:625_5: evam eva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:625_7: yāvan na vajropamaḥ samādhiḥ pratilabdho bhavati,
S06psp_5u:625_8: tataḥ sa ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayā sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti.
S06psp_5u:625_9: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:625_10: yadi bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:625_12: anyaḥ srotaāpannasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyaḥ sakṛdāgāmino 'nyo 'nāgāmitāyāḥ pratipannakasyānyo 'nāgāmino 'nyo 'rhattvapratipannakasyānyo 'rhato mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:625_13: anyaḥ pratyekabuddhasyānyas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya mārgaḥ? yadi bhagavann anya eva mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:625_14: tat kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān paripūrya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati? (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:625_15: 154) yadi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgāḥ paripurayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:625_16: mā khalu bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamako bhaviṣyati,
S06psp_5u:625_18: bhāvanāmārgam utpādya sakṛdāgāmitāyai pratipannakaḥ sakṛdāgāmī bhaviṣyaty,
S06psp_5u:625_22: asthānaṃ bhagavann anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamakamārgam utpādyāṣṭamakaḥ,
S06psp_5u:625_23: syād aṣṭamako bhūtvā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:625_24: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti,
S06psp_5u:625_25: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, evaṃ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:625_26: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti,
S06psp_5u:625_27: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. tat kathaṃ bhagavan jānīyāma vayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān utpādya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmatiti?
S06psp_5u:626_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:626_1: evam etat subhūte evam etat, asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśo yad bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ṣṭamako bhūtvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāpya sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyānāgāmiphalaṃ prāpyārhattvaṃ prāpya pratyekāṃ bodhiṃ prāpya bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmed iti,
S06psp_5u:626_2: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate, bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnuyād iti,
S06psp_5u:627_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann etān mārgān prāpya bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpnoti?
S06psp_5u:628_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:628_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prathamacittotpādam upādāya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carann aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena ca darśanena cātikrāmati.
S06psp_5u:628_2: katamā aṣṭa? yad uta śuklavidarśanābhūmir gotrabhūmir aṣṭamakabhūmir darśanabhūmis tanūbhūmir vītarāgabhūmiḥ kṛtāvībhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmir,
S06psp_5u:628_3: ayaṃ bhūminirdeśaḥ. sa imā aṣṭau bhūmīr jñānena darśanena cātikramya mārgajñatayā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:628_6: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte yad aṣṭamakasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:628_7: yaṃ srotaāpannasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:628_8: yat sakṛdāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:628_9: yad anāgāmino jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:628_10: yad arhato jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:628_11: yat pratyekabuddhasya jñānañ ca prahāṇañ ca sā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:628_12: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvamārgān sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ paripūrya mārgajñatayā bodhisattvaniyāmam avakrāmati,
S06psp_5u:628_13: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya sarvākārajñatājñānena ca sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśān prajahāti.
S06psp_5u:628_14: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgān paripūryānuttarā samyaksaṃbodhir abhisaṃbodhavyā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ phalopabhogena bhavitavyam.
S06psp_5u:629_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:629_1: ya ime bhagavan mārgā ākhyātāḥ śrāvakamārgaḥ pratyekabuddhamārgo buddhamārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:630_0: bhagavān āha: iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatāviśuddhir utpādayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:630_2: yair ākārair yair liṅgair yair nimittaiḥ sarvamārgākārajñatā visuddhir bhavati,
S06psp_5u:630_3: te ākārās tāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvenābhisaṃboddhavyāni,
S06psp_5u:630_4: abhisaṃbudhya pareṣām ākhyātavyāni nirdeśayitavyāni prakāśayitavyāni prajñepayitavyāni prasthāpayitavyāni,
S06psp_5u:630_5: vivaritavyāni parebhyo vinayārthāya yathā pare jānīyur iti.
S06psp_5u:630_6: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvarutasaṃketaghoṣāḥ samudānayitavyā uccārayitavyāś ca,
S06psp_5u:630_7: yai rutasaṃketaghoṣaiḥ trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau vijñāpayati yadidaṃ pratiśrutkopamā jñānena.
S06psp_5u:630_8: tad anena subhūte paryāyeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvamārgākārajñatā paripūrayitavyā,
S06psp_5u:630_10: nairayikānāṃ sattvānāṃ nairayiko mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca nairayikamārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:630_11: hetuto nivārayitavyāḥ, phalato nivārayitavyāḥ, tiryagyonigatānāṃ (PSP_5:156) sattvānāṃ tiryagmārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyo phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ tataś ca tiryagmārgān nivārayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:630_12: hetuto nivārayitavyāḥ, phalato nivārayitavyāḥ. evaṃ kiṃnarāṇāṃ mahoragānāṃ nāgānāṃ yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gandharvāṇām asurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ guhyakānāṃ cāraṇānāṃ vidyādharāṇāṃ siddhānāṃ sādhyānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:630_13: cāturmahārājakānāṃ devānāṃ trayastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:630_14: brahmapāriṣadyānāṃ devānāṃ brahmapurohitānāṃ mahābrahmāṇo mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam,
S06psp_5u:630_15: ābhāsvarāṇāṃ parīttābhānām apramāṇābhānāṃ parīttaśubhānāṃ apramāṇaśubhānāṃ śubhakṛtsnānām anubhrakānāṃ puṇyaprasavānāṃ bṛhatphalānām asaṃjñisattvānāṃ śuddhāvāsānām aspṛhāṇām atapānāṃ sudṛśānāṃ sudarśanānāṃ akaniṣṭhānāṃ devānāṃ,
S06psp_5u:630_16: ākāśānantyāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ vijñānānantyāyatanānām ākiṃcanyāyatanānāṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanānāṃ devānāṃ mārgo jñātavyo hetur jñātavyaḥ phalaṃ jñātavyam.
S06psp_5u:630_20: pañcendriyāṇi jñātavyāni, pañcabalāni jñātavyāni, saptabodhyaṅgāni jñātavyāni, āryāṣṭāṅgamārgo jñātavyaḥ, śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitavimokṣamukhāni jñātavyāni,
S06psp_5u:630_26: catvāri vaiśāradyāni catasraḥ pratisaṃvido 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā jñātavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:630_28: yaiś ca mārgair ye sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:630_29: ye sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:630_30: ye anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayitavyāḥ tān anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:630_32: ye pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyā tān pratyekāyāṃ bodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:630_33: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitavyās tān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayati,
S06psp_5u:630_35: 157) bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣitvā sattvānām āśayam avatarati,
S06psp_5u:630_36: sattvānām āśayam avatīrya tathā dharmaṃ deśayati yathāsya sā dharmadeśanāmoghākṣaṇā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:630_37: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hy asya puruṣendriye parāparajñānaṃ suvibhaktaṃ suvijñātaṃ ca bhavati,
S06psp_5u:630_38: sattvānāṃ gatiṃ cyutim upapattiṃ ca prajānāti.
S06psp_5u:630_39: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06psp_5u:630_40: atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyaṃ sarvadharmā antargatā,
S06psp_5u:630_41: ye kecid bodhipakṣyā dharmā, yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiś caritavyaṃ śrāvakayānikair vā pratyekabuddhayānikair vā caritavyam.
S06psp_5u:631_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:631_1: yadi bhagavan ye bodhipakṣyā dharmā yāvad yā bodhiḥ sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:631_3: tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārikā bhavanti? evaṃ bhagavan na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārikā vāpahārikā vā,
S06psp_5u:631_4: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavann ākāśan na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakaṃ vāpahārakaṃ vā.
S06psp_5u:631_5: evam eva bhagavan svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmā na kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā.
S06psp_5u:632_0: bhagavān āha: evam etat subhūte evam etat, na subhūte svalakṣaṇaśūnyā dharmāḥ kasyacid dharmasyāhārakā vāpahārakā vā,
S06psp_5u:632_1: ye vā subhūte sattvāḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyān dharmān na jānanti,
S06psp_5u:632_3: ime bodhipakṣyā dharmā bodher āhārakā bhavanti.
S06psp_5u:633_0: api tu khalu subhūte yañ ca rūpaṃ yā ca vedanā yā ca saṃjñā ye ca saṃskārā yac ca vijñānaṃ ye ca skandhā ye ca dhātavo yāni cāyatanāni yaś ca pratītyasamutpādo yāni ca pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni yā ca dānapāramitā yā ca śīlapāramitā yā ca kṣāntipāramitā yā ca vīryapāramitā yā ca dhyānapāramitā yā ca prajñāpāramitā yā cādhyātmaśūnyatā yā ca bahirdhāśūnyatā yā cādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā yā ca yāvad abhāvasvabhāva śūnyatā yac ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ yac ca caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ,
S06psp_5u:633_1: yac cākāśānantyāyatanaṃ yac ca vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ yac cākiṃcanyāyatanaṃ yac ca naivasaṃjñānā saṃjñāyatanaṃ yā ca mahāmaitrī yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca mahāmuditā yā ca (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:633_2: 158) mahopekṣā ye ca smṛtyupasthānasamyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgamārgā yā ca śūnyatā yac cānimittaṃ yac cāpraṇihitaṃ ye cāṣṭavimokṣā yāś ca navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayo yāni cāryasātyāni yāś cābhijñā ye ca samādhayo yāni ca dhāraṇīmukhāni yāś ca daśabodhisattvabhūmayo yāni ca daśatathāgatabalāni yāni ca catvāri vaiśāradyāni yāś ca catasraḥ pratisaṃvido ye cāṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā yā ca mahākaruṇā yā ca yāvat sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_5u:633_3: ārye 'smin dharmavinaye sarva ete dharmā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ.
S06psp_5u:633_4: te ca khalu punaḥ subhūte tathāgatena sattvānām avatāraṇārthāya lokavyavahāreṇa vyavakṛtās te dharmā prajñāpayitavyāḥ,
S06psp_5u:633_5: na punaḥ paramārthena. tatra subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvatra śikṣitavyaṃ jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā kecid dharmāḥ pratibodhavyāḥ kecin na pratibodhavyāḥ
S06psp_5u:634_0: subhūtir āha: katame dharmā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena jñānena ca darśanena ca śikṣitvā na pratibodhavyāḥ? katame dharmāḥ pratibodhavyāḥ?
S06psp_5u:635_0: bhagavān āha: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca śikṣitvā jñānena ca darśanena ca na pratibodhavyā,
S06psp_5u:635_1: sarvākārajñatā jñānena ca darśanena ca pratibodhavyā,
S06psp_5u:635_3: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ārye 'smin dharmavinaye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:636_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:636_1: āryo dharmavinayo 'nāryo dharmavinaya iti bhagavann ucyate,
S06psp_5u:636_2: katamo bhagavann āryo dharmavinayaḥ? katamo bhagavann anāryo dharmavinayaḥ? kiyatā bhagavann āryo dharmavinayaḥ? kiyatā bhagavann anāryo dharmavinaya ity ucyate?
S06psp_5u:637_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:637_1: iha subhūte śrāvakāḥ pratyekabuddhā bodhisattvāś ca mahāsattvāś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā rāgena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:637_12: prathamena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:637_14: caturthena dhyānena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktā,
S06psp_5u:637_15: maitryā karuṇayā muditayopekṣayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_16: ākāśānantyāyatanena vijñānānantyāyatanenākiṃcanyāyatanena naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanena na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_18: āryasatyaiḥ śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_19: aṣṭavimokṣair navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhiḥ pañcabhir abhijñābhir na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_27: yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatayā na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_28: daśabhis tathāgatabalair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_29: caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśābhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_30: saṃskṛtadhātāv asaṃskṛtadhātau na saṃyuktā na visaṃyuktāḥ.
S06psp_5u:637_31: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sarvadharmā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_5u:637_32: te arūpiṇo 'rūpibhiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:637_33: anidarśanā nidarśanaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:637_34: apratighā apratighaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā,
S06psp_5u:637_35: alakṣaṇā alakṣaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ na saṃyuktā vā na visaṃyuktā vā.
S06psp_5u:638_0: imā subhūte 'rūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇā pāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yatra bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:638_1: yatra śikṣitvā na kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇam upalabhyate.
S06psp_5u:639_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:639_1: na punar bhagavan rūpalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ na vedanālakṣaṇe na saṃjñālakṣaṇe na saṃskāralakṣaṇe na vijñānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:639_5: nābdhātulakṣaṇe na tejodhātulakṣaṇe na vāyudhātulakṣaṇe nākāśadhātulakṣaṇe (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:639_8: na śīlapāramitālakṣaṇe na kṣāntipāramitālakṣaṇe na vīryapāramitālakṣaṇe na dhyānapāramitālakṣaṇe na prajñāpāramitālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:639_9: nādhyātmaśūnyatālakṣaṇe na bahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatālakṣaṇe na yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:639_11: na dvitīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na tṛtīyadhyānalakṣaṇe na caturthadhyānalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:639_12: na mahāmaitrīlakṣaṇe na mahākaruṇālakṣaṇe na muditālakṣaṇe nopekṣālakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:639_13: nākāśānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe na vijñānānantyāyatanalakṣaṇe nākiṃcanyāyatanalakṣaṇe naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanalakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:640_0: subhūtir āha: yadi bhagavann eteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇe na śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:640_1: kathaṃ bhagavan na śikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmāṇāṃ dharmalakṣaṇe śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim atikramiṣyati? śrāvakapratyekabudddhabhūmim anatikramya kathaṃ bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyati? bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakramya kathaṃ sarvākārajñatām anuprāpsyati? sarvākārajñatām ananuprāpya kathaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣyati? dharmacakram apravartya kathaṃ sattvān saṃsārāt parimocayiṣyati śrāvakayānena vā pratyekabuddhayānena vā buddhayānena vā?
S06psp_5u:641_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:641_1: yadi subhūte kasyacid dharmasya lakṣaṇaṃ syāt,
S06psp_5u:641_2: tadā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ syād,
S06psp_5u:641_3: yasmāt tarhi sarvadharmā alakṣaṇā arūpiṇo 'nidarśanā apratighā ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās tasmāt tad bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam.
S06psp_5u:641_4: tat kasya hetoḥ? yadi pūrvaṃ lakṣaṇam abhaviṣyat paścād alakṣaṇaṃ na bhaved,
S06psp_5u:641_5: yasmāt tarhi subhūte pūrvam eva te sarvadharmā alakṣaṇās tasmāt tarhy apy alakṣaṇās,
S06psp_5u:641_6: tasmād bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpi lakṣaṇe śikṣitavyaṃ,
S06psp_5u:641_7: nāpy alakṣaṇe śikṣitavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ? utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthita evaiṣa lakṣaṇadhātuḥ.
S06psp_5u:642_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:642_1: yadi bhagavann alakṣaṇāḥ sarvadharmā na vilakṣaṇāḥ,
S06psp_5u:642_2: ekalakṣaṇā yad utālakṣaṇās, tat kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati? na hi bhagavann avibhāvya prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śakyā śrāvakabhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā atikramitum,
S06psp_5u:642_3: anatikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā na śakyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramituṃ,
S06psp_5u:642_4: bodhisattvaniyāmam anavakramya na śakyānutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntir utpādayitum,
S06psp_5u:642_5: anutpattikair dharmaiḥ kṣāntim anutpādya na śakyā bodhisattvābhijñā utpādayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:642_7: buddhakṣetram apariśodhya na śakyāḥ sattvān paripācāyituṃ,
S06psp_5u:642_8: sattvān aparipācya na śakyā sarvākārajñatām anuprāptuṃ,
S06psp_5u:642_9: sarvākārajñatām ananuprāpya na śakyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:642_10: dharmacakram apravartya na śakyāḥ sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:642_14: nāpi śakyāḥ sattvā dānamaye puṇyakriyāvastūni pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ,
S06psp_5u:642_17: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:642_18: evam etat subhūte evam etat, alakṣaṇāḥ subhūte sarvadharmā na vilakṣaṇāḥ.
S06psp_5u:643_0: subhūtir āha: katham alakṣaṇasya dharmasya prajñāpāramitābhavanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:644_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsāttvasyaikalakṣaṇā anekalakṣaṇā,
S06psp_5u:644_1: alakṣaṇā bhāvanā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati.
S06psp_5u:645_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavann alakṣaṇā bhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:647_0: subhūtir āha: kathaṃ bhagavan sarvadharmabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā bhavati?
S06psp_5u:648_19: saṃskārabhāvanāvibhāvanā, vijñānabhāvanāvibhāvanā, nāmarūpabhāvanāvibhāvanā, ṣaḍāyatanabhāvanā vibhāvanā, sparśabhāvanā vibhāvanā, vedanābhāvanā vibhāvanā, tṛṣṇābhāvanāvibhāvanā, upādānabhāvanāvibhāvanā, bhavabhāvanāvibhāvanā, jātibhāvanāvibhāvanā, jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_5u:649_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:649_1: kathaṃ bhagavan rūpabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā? vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06psp_5u:649_2: kathaṃ vijñānabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā? evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatāḥ bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmā mahākaruṇā sarvākārajñatā,
S06psp_5u:649_4: srotaāpattiphalaṃ (PSP_5:165) sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ pratyekabodhir yāvat kathaṃ bhagavan sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇabhāvanāvibhāvanā prajñāpāramitābhāvanā?
S06psp_5u:650_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:650_1: iha subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:650_2: vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā, vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na bhāvayati.
S06psp_5u:650_3: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_5u:650_4: evaṃ skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādāḥ pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni sarvapāramitāḥ sarvaśūnyatā bodhipakṣyā dharmā āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmāḥ sarvākārajñatā bhāva iti na bhāvayati,
S06psp_5u:650_7: tat kasya hetoḥ? nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā,
S06psp_5u:650_10: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bhāve eṣo 'ham iti saṃjñā,
S06psp_5u:650_13: yo dvābhyām antābhyāṃ saktas tasya nāsti vimokṣo,
S06psp_5u:650_14: nāsti subhūte bhāvasaṃjñinaḥ smṛtyupasthānabhāvanā na samyakprahāṇabhāvanā narddhipādabhāvanā nendriyabhāvanā na balabhāvanā na bodhyaṅgabhāvanā nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgabhāvanā na duḥkhāryasatyabhāvanā na samudayāryasatyabhāvanā na nirodhāryasatyabhāvanā na mārgāryasatyabhāvanā na śūnyatābhāvanā nānimittabhāvanā nāpraṇihitabhāvanā nāpramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattibhāvanā nāṣṭavimokṣabhāvanā na navānupūrvavihārasamāpattibhāvanā na sarvaśūnyatābhāvanā na samādhidhāraṇīmukhabhāvanā nābhijñābhāvanā na daśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmabhāvanā na mahākaruṇābhāvanā na sarvākārajñatābhāvanā.
S06psp_5u:650_15: tat kasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa bhāve saktaḥ.
S06psp_5u:651_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat: tat kim iti bhagavan bhāvaḥ? kim ity abhāvaḥ?
S06psp_5u:652_0: bhagavān āha: dvayaṃ subhūte bhāvaḥ, advayam abhāvaḥ.
S06psp_5u:653_0: subhūtir āha: kim iti bhagavan dvayaṃ? kim ity advayam?
S06psp_5u:654_16: yāvad dvayaṃ tāvad bhāvo, yāvad bhāvaṃ tāvat saṃskārā, yāvat saṃskārās tāvat sattvā na parimucyante jātyā jarayā vyādhinā maraṇena śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ.
S06psp_5u:654_18: nāsti dvayasaṃjñino dānaṃ, nāsti śīlaṃ nāsti kṣāntir nāsti vīryaṃ nāsti dhyānaṃ nāsti prajñā nāsti mārgo nāsti jñānaṃ nāsty abhisamayo nāsty antaśo 'nulomikī kṣāntiḥ.
S06psp_5u:654_19: kutaḥ punā rūpasya parijñā, vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ,
S06psp_5u:654_21: kutaḥ pāramitānāṃ parijñā, kutaḥ śūnyatāmukhānāṃ parijñā,
S06psp_5u:654_25: kutaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ parijñā yasya nāsti mārgabhāvanā,
S06psp_5u:654_28: kutas tasyānāgāmiphalaṃ, kutas tasyārhatvaphalaṃ, kutas tasya pratyekabuddhatvaṃ,
S06psp_5u:655_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:655_1: yadi bhagavan bhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir nāsti kutaḥ punaḥ prāptiḥ kuto 'bhisamayaḥ? kiṃ punar bhagavann abhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntiḥ? (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:655_2: 167) śuklavidarśanābhūmir vā gotrabhūmir vā aṣṭamakabhūmir vā darśanabhūmir vā tanūbhūmir vā vītarāgabhūmir vā kṛtāvībhūmir vā pratyekabuddhabhūmir vā bodhisattvabhūmir vā,
S06psp_5u:655_3: yā ca mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
S06psp_5u:655_7: punar bhagavan nābhāvasaṃjñinaḥ kasyacid dharmasya sthānaṃ vā nirodho vā utpādo vā bhavati,
S06psp_5u:656_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:656_1: evam etat subhūte evam etan, nābhāvasaṃjñina ānulomikī kṣāntir,
S06psp_5u:656_2: na śuklavidarśanābhūmir na gotrabhūmir nāṣṭamakabhūmir na darśanabhūmir na tanūbhūmir na vītarāgabhūmir na kṛtāvībhūmir na pratyekabuddhabhūmir na bodhisattvabhūmir,
S06psp_5u:656_3: na sā mārgabhāvanāyāṃ mārgabhāvanām āgamya kleśān prajahīta śrāvakabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā pratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktān vā,
S06psp_5u:657_0: subhūtir āha: kiṃ punar bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhāvasaṃjñā vā bhāvaty abhavasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:657_1: rūpasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā vā saṃjñāsaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:657_2: skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpādasaṃjñā vā pratītyasamutpādāṅgasaṃjñā vā pāramitāsaṃjñā vā sarvaśūnyatāsaṃjñā vā bodhipakṣyadharmāryasatyasaṃjñā vā pramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattisaṃjñā vā dhāraṇīmukhasaṃjñā vā śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikābuddhadharmasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:657_3: rāgasaṃjñā vā rāgaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā doṣasaṃjñā vā doṣaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mohasaṃjñā vā mohaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:657_4: avidyāsaṃjñā vāvidyāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā saṃskārasaṃjñā vā saṃskāraprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vijñānasaṃjñā vā vijñānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpasaṃjñā vā nāmarūpaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā ṣaḍāyatanasaṃjñā vā ṣaḍāyatanaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sparśasaṃjñā vā sparśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā vedanāsaṃjñā vā vedanāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā (PSP_5:
S06psp_5u:657_5: 168) tṛṣṇāsaṃjñā vā tṛṣṇāprahāṇasaṃjñā vopādānasaṃjñā vopādānaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā bhavasaṃjñā vā bhavaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jātisaṃjñā vā jātiprahāṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇasaṃjñā vā jarāmaraṇaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:657_6: śokaparidevasaṃjñā vā śokaparidevaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā duṣkhasaṃjñā vā duṣkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsasaṃjñā vā daurmanasyopāyāsaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:657_7: duḥkhasaṃjñā vā duḥkhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā samudayasaṃjñā vā samudayaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā nirodhasaṃjñā vā nirodhaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā mārgasaṃjñā vā mārgaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:657_8: sarvākārajñatāsaṃjñā vā sarvākārajñatāprahāṇasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśasaṃjñā vā sarvavāsanānusaṃdhikleśaprahāṇasaṃjñā vā.
S06psp_5u:658_0: bhagavān āha: na subhūte, naitat subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kvacid dharme bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:658_1: eṣaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānulomikī kṣāntir yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā vābhāvasaṃjñā vā,
S06psp_5u:658_2: eṣaivāsya mārgabhāvanā yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā,
S06psp_5u:658_3: etad evāsya phalaṃ yatra nāsti bhāvasaṃjñā nābhāvasaṃjñā.
S06psp_5u:658_4: abhāvaḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārgaḥ,
S06psp_5u:658_5: abhāvaś caivābhisamayas, tad anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇaivaṃ veditavyam,
S06psp_5u:659_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:659_3: yeṣām abhisaṃbodhāya sarvadharmeṣu ca vaśavartitā visayavartitā cānuprāptā?
S06psp_5u:660_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:660_1: ihāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
S06psp_5u:660_3: teṣāñ ca dhyānānāṃ dhyānāṅgānāṃ ca nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs taiś ca dhyānair dhyānāṅgaiś ca na manye,
S06psp_5u:660_6: so 'han tāni catvāri dhyānāny ākāraviśuddhāny upasaṃpadyotsāhaṃ dhyānaṃ vipākaṃ kṛtvā vābhijñājñānasākṣātkriyāyai cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi,
S06psp_5u:660_11: 169) cittam abhinirṇāmayāmi, so 'han tāsāṃ sākṣātkriyānāṃ nimittam anudgṛhṇaṃs tābhir abhijñābhir na manye,
S06psp_5u:660_13: so 'han tāḥ pañcābhijñā ākāśasamāḥ paśyāmi samāpadye,
S06psp_5u:660_14: so 'haṃ punaḥ subhūte ekalakṣaṇasamāyuktayā prajñayānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya yāvad idaṃ duṣkhaṃ,
S06psp_5u:660_15: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ, ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ, iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad iti,
S06psp_5u:660_16: daśabhis tathāgatabalaiḥ samanvāgataś caturbhir vaiśāradyaiś catasṛbhiḥ pratisaṃvidbhir aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sattvāṃs triṣu rāśiṣu vyākaromi.
S06psp_5u:661_0: evam ukte āyuṣmān subhūtir bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:661_1: kathaṃ bhagavaṃs tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhāvasvabhāvāni catvāri dhyānāny utpāditāni ṣaḍ abhijñā utpāditāḥ sattvāsattayā ca sattvās triṣu rāśiṣu vyākṛtāḥ?
S06psp_5u:662_0: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtim etad avocat:
S06psp_5u:662_1: sacet subhūte kāmānāṃ vā pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vā bhāvo vābhāvo vā bhaviṣyan,
S06psp_5u:662_2: nāhaṃ subhūte pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran nābhāvasvabhāvān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān viditvā prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
S06psp_5u:662_3: yasmāt tarhi subhūte kāmānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsti,
S06psp_5u:662_4: pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
S06psp_5u:662_5: tasmād ahaṃ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣaṃ,
S06psp_5u:662_6: evaṃ yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya vyahārṣam.
S06psp_5u:662_7: sacet subhūte abhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā abhaviṣyan,
S06psp_5u:662_8: nāhaṃ subhūte sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsye yāvat sattvāṃs tribhyo rāśibhyo na vyupaśamayiṣye,
S06psp_5u:662_9: yasmāt tarhi subhūte sarvābhijñānāṃ svabhāvo vābhāvo vā bhāvo vā nāsty anyatrābhāvasvabhāvāt,
S06psp_5u:662_10: tasmāt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvābhijñā abhāvasvabhāvā iti viditvānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syāṃ,
S06psp_5u:663_0: āryapañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāyāṃ bhagavatyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām abhisamayālaṃkārānusāreṇa saṃśodhitāyāṃ mūrdhābhisamayādhikāraḥ śikṣāpariśuddhiparivartaḥ pañcamaḥ
